In the Weapons shop...
Weapons ShopkeeperSorry, listen I... No, nothing... never mind.
ManSorry, but we're entirely sold out now.What's this here? Ah, no... that's uh......a sample! Yeah, that's it... a sample. Sorry, but why don't you all come back later?
The local pub, Turtle's Paradise... Outside is a flyer.
Pub [Turtle's Paradise] Publicity Flyers! Notice[Turtle's Paradise] is now having a Publicity flyer campaign.They will be posted all over the world. So make sure you look for our flyers that say "Turtle's Paradise"There's six in all. If you find them all, make sure to let the owner of Turtle's Paradise know. You can win a prize!Just reading them's good enough, so please don't take them down or rip them up!!--Owner, Turtle's Paradise
BarkeeperHey, hey, welcome! You on a trip? Well, just relax and make yourself at home.Nowadays, thanks to tourism, Wutai's able to get by.
ManHey. Did you hear? There used to be a Water God here in Wutai.They say the Water God was a huge snake!Now we live in a world filled with Mako. Not many people would believe in something like that now.But some in the world, and here in Wutai, still believe.Believe in the scales of the Water God and in materia that has its power in it.

RenoDrink, Rude! How long have we been a team...?There have been hard times being a Turk, but all in all, I'm glad I did it.I even got to meet a bunch of wing nuts like you.
RudeTo the Turks... To Reno... cheers!
Outside the Item Shop, a little kid is running around.
Little KidAlright, alright, alright! I know!On the side of the mountain, right there in your face is Da-chao!I hear you can climb to the top, but since it's dangerous I'd be mighty careful if I were you!A girl with materia? No, there hasn't been anyone climbing Da-chao for some time now.You know I've noticed that there's  pounding noise from time to time in this store.
Lord Godo is in this house.He used to be quite strong, but now, all he does is sleep......Anyhow, for some reason Yuffie's had a fondness for materia ever since I can remember.She's always hung around places she thought might have it.
In the Item Shop...
Item ShopkeeperWe got a lot of different stuff here. Take what you want.
WomanI'm sorry. The sign outside says "Materia", but there's almost no materia left anywhere in Wutai.Listen, this is just a backwoods town. We don't have much to do with Shinra, and besides...If we had a lot of materia, Wutai would be a much more exciting town, but we don't...

Received "MP Absorb" Materia!

Man outside Godo's HouseThat five-storied pagoda over there is called the Pagoda of the Five Mighty Gods...The Five Gods are Power, Speed, Magic, War and Omni, who has the best characteristics of everything.Since ancient times, we in Wutai, have worshipped Da-chao and the Water God.Legend has it that the village has been protected by Da-chao, the Water God, and the Five Mighty Gods.But in the last battle, we didn't fare so well... I guess our beliefs were based on nothing more than legends.

Gorky...

Cloud- No- Yes

No

Yes

Inside Godo's house, they find Godo lying on a futon.
GodoGOOGAH... what do you want?Don't have... GAH... anything much but, you should be able to... GOO... rest yourselves here. GOGAH... make yourselves at home.......Yuffie? ......nope, never heard of her. ...GOOGO......you again? I told you once, and I'm telling you again, I don't know her.
He sits up.
Listen, I said I didn't know her! There isn't anyone named Yuffie here in Wutai!
He gets to his feet and turns to face Cloud.
...never seen you around here before...Lately I've been seeing a lot of Shinra soldiers around here... You wouldn't have anything to do with that would you?I don't care about who you are.But if you're in trouble with the Shinra, I'm going to have to ask you to leave.I don't want the Shinra hanging around here looking over my shoulder.
YuffieWhat's with you, you coward!
She jumps down from the ceiling to stand in his doorway.
GodoYuffie......!
YuffieYou scared of the Shinra?Then why don't you fall into line and obey them, just like all of the other towns!
She runs into the room.
Those guys are the ones who are really fighting the Shinra!
GodoShut up! What would you know about this?
YuffieYou get beaten once, and then that's it?What happened to the mighty Wutai I used to know?
GodoNo kid like you's going to talk to me like that!You keep acting like that! You ought to be ashamed of yourself!
YuffieThat's my style! And it's my own business, not yours! Don't you try and dictate what I should do!
GodoStyle...? Dictate...?Throwin' around all those fancy words... You're a miserable daughter!
YuffieHmph! You're a sad excuse for a father!!
She runs out and into the shrine down the hall. Godo starts to chase after her, but gives up and returns to his room.
Godo......take your things and get out of here now.To protect Wutai, we cannot afford to stand up to Shinra.
She's always getting into fights. But in that, she takes after Godo to a tee.Like father like daughter...Yuffie's like that, you know. Sometimes she'll just bust into people's houses.Then she hides in the shadows... Just like a little kid.
Woman Walking near RiverLife is just like the flowing of a river. It flows from the large ocean of life, and eventually it returns back to it.Wutai is a historical place. There are some very unusual things here you should see.Yuffie? I saw her a while ago. She must be in one of the houses around here.
At the old man's house...

Now look at Wutai...That's why... if I had lots of materia I could...

Hey! I hate people who lie about their identities! Leave this tower at once!

GOOGAH... what do you want?Don't have... GAH... anything much but, you should be able to... GOO... rest yourselves here. GOGAH... make yourselves at home.......Yuffie? ......nope, never heard of her. ...GOOGO......you again? I told you once, and I'm telling you again, I don't know her.
What's with you, you coward!
Yuffie......!
You scared of the Shinra?Then why don't you fall into line and obey them, just like all of the other towns!
Shut up! What would you know about this?
You get beaten once, and then that's it?What happened to the mighty Wutai I used to know?
No kid like you's going to talk to me like that!You keep acting like that! You ought to be ashamed of yourself!
That's my style! And it's my own business, not yours! Don't you try and dictate what I should do!
Style...? Dictate...?Throwin' around all those fancy words... You're a miserable daughter!
Hmph! You're a sad excuse for a father!!
......take your things and get out of here now.To protect Wutai, we cannot afford to stand up to Shinra.

Character: Man on the Path to Godo's House
Line: She's always getting into fights. But in that, she takes after Godo to a tee.Like father like daughter...Yuffie's like that, you know. Sometimes she'll just bust into people's houses.Then she hides in the shadows... Just like a little kid.

Life is just like the flowing of a river. It flows from the large ocean of life, and eventually it returns back to it.Wutai is a historical place. There are some very unusual things here you should see.Yuffie? I saw her a while ago. She must be in one of the houses around here.
Oh no! More weirdosNo, these aren't like the one from a while ago, but these ones look weird too!
Well, well. Long time no see. What have you been up to? Let's see... what was your name?
No, Gramps! This isn't anyone you know! This is just some stranger who barged into our house!What are we going to do, Gramps? Some strange-looking girl came in here a minute ago and I...
Oh, how exciting. You a friend of my grandson's?
No, Gramps! These guy's are creepy! They're runnin' all over the place!

Character: Man on the Path to Godo's House
Line: She's always getting into fights. But in that, she takes after Godo to a tee.Like father like daughter...That reminds me, Lately I've been seeing a kid around here that reminds me of Yuffie.Always sneakin' around corners And into somethin' she shouldn't be.
Wait, that damn Yuffie's still gotta be somewhere in this cheap town! Or you all jes' gonna go on?
I don't think she came out from here... Is that ok?
Knowing Yuffie, she's still hidden somewhere in town. You sure?
I know she hasn't left town! You still want to leave?
She couldn't have left town... I think she is must still be here... Or do you want to go on?
You lettin' that damn kid off the hook? I know she's gotta be in this town somewhere!
You can't get away, Yuffie.
Give it up, Yuffie!
You lost, Yuffie.
O... ok, I know... I was wrong......You win. I'll give you back your materia...
So our reports were right! He IS here on vacation!We've finally found him! Get the Turks here for back-up!
...what a drag.
Wh, what was that...?
Right now we're off duty and can't run off to save your butts.
We know you're off duty, but...
If you knew that, then don't bother us! Lookin' at you is makin' me sober.
But you all have orders from headquarters to look for him too!
All right, that's it! We'll get him without any help from the Turks, just you see!
And don't think that headquarters isn't going to hear about this!!
Reno, do you think that was really such a good idea!?I mean is that the way a professional, a Turk would act!?
Elena. Don't misunderstand.A pro isn't someone who sacrifices himself for his job. That's just a fool.
Rude...?
Well, I don't buy that! Goodbye!!
Relax. She's not a child. Let her have her way now...
I know, the materia, right? I have it stored in a safe place. ...Follow me.
[Turtle's Paradise] No. 6Drink at the "Turtle's Paradise" And talk about Wutai!You'll know "Turtle's Paradise" by the big pot outside!!

...I've been hearing that ever since I was little.Before I was born, Wutai was a lot more crowded and more important...You saw what it looks like now, right? ...JUST a resort town...After we lost the war, we got peace, but with that, we lost something else. Now look at Wutai...That's why... if I had lots of materia I could...
Listen, Yuffie. I don't care about the history of Wutai or your feelings.You've got our materia and I want it back... now.If you give it back now, we'll drop the whole thing.
I'm sorry, Yuffie. I know how you feel, but we need materia too....We just can't let you have it. Please understand.
......Dammit, Yuffie. We ain't got time to be listening to your life story.If you want materia, get it yourself. That's how you should do it.
I know. I know that...That... sniff... switch... the lever on the left...... materia's... sniff, hic... in there.
Ain't nuthin' we can do about it...
I feel bad, but......
Now, the Materia...
Were we a little too harsh on her?
Well, let's get our materia back.
There was nothing else to do.
Hmmph... I dunno......
- Flip the Left Lever- Flip the Right Lever
Wh...what the hell is this!?
Eyaaaaah
Eyaaaaah
Wh, what are you doing!?
Wh, what is this!?
Whoa!?

Ha ha ha------! Never trust anyone that easily!! / Ha ha------! You should've listened!!The Materia's mine! Tough!You want your materia? Then go find it yourself!Yeah that's right. And when you're looking for the materia, remember you gotta steel it.Heh heh... steel... steel! Get it?C ya!!
Y, yo, wait up!!
Wait, don't leave us!
W...wait don't leave us here!
Help us first!
Hey help us...please!
Wait, don't go by yourself!
Hey! Help me first!
Seems like the town got really boisterous since you arrived. Did anything happen?
Congrats! You have just found all six flyers for the "Turtles Paradise"!How wonderful! Now here is your prize, just as we promised!!
Please come again to "Turtles Paradise"! We're looking forward to seeing you!
......It's just that we're off duty!I don't feel like drinking with you. And don't talk to me.
Let go! I SAID let GO!Hey! Who do you think I...... OW! What're you doin'...? Jerk!
Oh! You're......!
Ww, who are you!?
Corneo!?
Don Corneo!?
The hell are you doing!
Hohi!I've finally got a new chicky!Two for one, in fact! Hohi, hohi!
Two!?
H......hey! Let go of me! You're gonna regret this!!
Hohi, hohi! Hohihi!
Now listen up! They must be in the area! Find them no matter what!
Yes, sir!!
There he is! It's Corneo! Don't let him get away!Attaaaack!
Hmm... that Corneo is good at escaping...
......Elena.
Let's go, Rude. We'll give them a taste of what the Turks can do.
......Sounded pretty good.
......Ok. Corneo took Yuffie from us.And without Yuffie, there's no way we'll get our materia back.
......all right. Corneo stole Yuffie from us, as well.And without her, there's no way we'll get our materia back.
......that's just beautiful! And now that *#$^@'s walked off with Yuffie, too!And without that brat, we can't get our hands on our materia!
Don't misunderstand.We have no intention of joining you. But for now, we'll agree not to bother each other. That's all.
That's fine. We have absolutely no intention of cooperating with the Turks either.Now, uh, just what direction did Corneo run off to?
The same goes for us. We don't want to be friendly with the Turks.Now which direction did Corneo run off in?
Of course! There ain't no way we'd wanna join up with the Turks anyway!Anyhow, which direction did that %^$*& run off in?
Hmm, nice attitude. Here's a clue, it's the place that stands out the most.

Character: Man on the Path to Godo's House
Line: Two girls just went off towards Da-chao. I wonder if that place is starting to become popular with the kids?One had herself all tangled up in a rope. And the other one kind of looked like Yuffie.
Alright, alright, alright! I saw an old man in flashy clothes running towards Da-chao!He was babblin' somethin' and looked like he could float! It almost bowled me over!
You're finally here. We're gonna split into two.You do whatever you want. But don't endanger Elena.Don't worry. We won't do anything to that girl, Yuffie.For now...
Don't fool around. You know the enemy's not gonna wait for us, right?
Whoa!!Can't go through here... That flame would make crispy critters of us in an instant.
Eyaaaah!There is no way past this!
Damn, that's hot!I like hot baths, but this is TOO hot!
Hmm! Delicious... scrumptious! I think I've just found a new HOBBY!Which shall it be? Hmm... Hmm...Should I go... with HER?
He... hey, I'm one of the 'Turks'! Don't think you can get away with this!?
Or... maybe... HER?
Oh GAWD! If I knew this was gonna happen, I would've taken rope escape lessons more seriously!!
Hmm!!! I've made my choice! My companion for the night will be.........the cheerful one!
GROSS-NESS!Don't mess with me old man! You don't even have any Materia!
Oooooh! And she's saucy, too! Wheee! Wheee!
All right, that's it!!
Hold it right there!
Hey, hey, hey! That's as far as you go!
Hee-haw. What... what's goin' on!? Who's there?
Oh man! Cloud......!
Wheeel... long time no see.
Don't tell me you forgot...
You damn Midgar hyena...!
You just don't get it, do you...!?
That fall into the trap really hurt!
Hurry and let the two go!
Listen you stupid, slimy, sleazy old scab bag! If you want to get women, there's such a thing as the RIGHT way!
I don't care what you're doing, so much as the idiotic way you're doing it...
Maybe God'd forgive an ugly ^#@# like you, but I won't!
Be quiet! None of you know how much I've suffered since then...It's a long story, but......
I don't really care! Let Yuffie and Elena go!
We don't want to hear it! Just let the two go!
I don't really give a damn! You're gonna let the two girls go, or else I'm gonna break your arm!

Hmm... You guys are... serious. ......Good, good....this ain't no time for me to be fooling around either...Why did you kill my little Aps?I'm gonna make you PLAY with my new pet, so you won't get in the way of my search for a bride!RAPPS---come here!!
Wait...Just wait a second!
SHUT UP!
You better say your prayers!
Don't be such a poor loser, old man!
Just listen to me - it won't take long.Why do you think a bad guy like me would swallow his pride and plead for his life?
- 1 Because he's ready to die- 2 Because he's sure to win- 3 Because he's clueless
Hmm...! WRONG...!
Hmm...! RIGHT!
Hmm...! Close, but no cigar...!
Eyaaaah...!
Makes me so MAD...!
If I push this button, they'll fall upside down, and we'll have a SQUASHED TOMATOES!
Damn...!
Damn dirty-playin' $#%@&T$*^%$!
All right...
Coward!
Grrrrrgh...!
You sure are vulgar!
So this is how a loser lives...!
Now, give me your women too!Ha, ha, ha, ha! I guess I'm the one laughing last!
No, that would be us.
Hee-haw. What... what's goin' on!? Who's there?
...The Turks!
You knew this was gonna happen ever since you leaked that secret.We're going to take care of you... personally.
DAMMIT! Then they're all goin' with me!
Ugh...!
Good timing, Rude.
...Let's get to work.

All right, Corneo. This'll be over quick, so listen up.Why do you think we went to all the trouble of teaming up with those guys to get you...?1. Because we were ready to die2. Because we were sure of victory3. Because we were clueless
Two... Number two?
All wrong.
No...! Wait, sto......!
The correct answer was...
...because it's our job.
Oh, thank you very much...!I never expected you'd to come help......
Elena, don't act so weak.You're a Turks!
Y... Yes, sir!
Never thought you'd come an' help us...
Thanks for your help.
Th... Thanks.
I'll just say you... helped.
You guys have some good in you.
It would appear thanks are in order...
I guess, thanks for today.
Yes... this is .Yes... Yes... I'll get on it right away.
Was that the company?
Yeah, they want us to find Cloud...
Are we on...?
No, today we're off duty.
Hey---who cares about that!? Get----me-----down----!
Phew, perfect. Now the materia is back in its rightful place.
Hey... the placement of it is all messed up.
Hey, what is this...? The placement of it's all messed up!
What the hell's goin' on!? The placement of the materia's all messed up!
Huh? Oh, it'll be all right...Don't be so picky!Anyways, that sure was close......No, normally I would kick their butts, Boom, Bang!!
I'd rather deal with my dad than deal with that guy.
Oh, by the way, some of those guys from the Turks are good, huh?At least, after all that, we got the materia back.Now come on everybody, let's continue our journey...
.........Come on, wait---!
Materia is like Life. They both come from the large ocean of life, and both must return to it.
Listen, I'm sorry about last time. Yuffie told me not to sell anything to you.
Hey yo! Welcome!Strike while the iron's hot, I say! We got some of the best blades right out of the furnace!

Alright, alright, alright! I know!On the side of the mountain, right there in your face is Da-chao!I hear you can climb to the top, but since it's dangerous I'd be mighty careful if I were you!Why Da-chao? Alright, alright, alright! I don't know!
Freeze!Miss Yuffie! You cannot go on to the second floor until you defeat me!
Oh, Miss Yuffie! Will you be climbing the pagoda today?
- Yeah, that's it- No way!
Then I, Sacred , will be your opponent on the first floor!
Yo! They call me ! I'll be watchin' your fight with Gorky!
Then, begin!Power Change!
It's just my opinion, but you need more training!  is disappointed!
No good! You have to do Gorky! Are you mocking this Pagoda?
Shut up! Shut up! SHADDUP!
Here I am, Miss Yuffie!
Of course!
Hmm, I thought you were just a wild girl, but you handled that pretty well!Well, we'll see how you do on next one...
Winning Miss Yuffie's heart must mean you have tremendous skill.
You aren't good enough to be here! This is the Wutai Temple of Martial Arts!
Hey, you there! Don't ignore me!
Who's next?
Are you blind? I'm right here!
What? I gotta fight a punk?
Heh! Punk. I'm more of an adult than some bimbo girl!
Wh, what did you say!?
See what I mean? That kind of anger's what makes you so immature!Don't pat yourself on the back until you beat me!
Now watch...!
'bout the only thing you do really good is breathe! Sure you're brave enough to fight!
- Stop yappin'!- I'll forgive you
Hm, so someone finally got past Gorky.
So when it comes down to it, you're just all talk. Brat!
So, I guess it's time for  to stand in...
Here I go, brat! Speed Change!
HYAAAAAAH! BRATBRATBRATBRAT!!
You can't go to the next floor unless you beat Shake.
Shut up! Shut up! SHADDUP!
URRGRAAAAGH! So you CAN fight a bit!
Of course!
Ho, ho, ho... It's been a while since I felt pain...
Compared to me, all of you are nothin' but a buncha babies.
That being the case, we have nothing further to discuss.
How dare they mock us like that, thinking they could sneak past us.
So even Shake's been defeated. It's been a while since you had to fight, Chekhov.
Unfortunately, this is as far as it goes. Staniv, you watch over there.
That ain't going to happen! I'll teach you about the strength of youth!
Keep mouthing off like that, little girl, and you're going to get burned.
- I got insurance- Let's get this over with, old bag
Ho, ho, ho. We'll see if you still talk like that after you taste some of my Sacred Magic...Magic Change!
Ho, ho, ho. What do you expect from a child barely out of diapers!?
First, Chekhov will keep you company...
Ho, ho, ho! What does a immature young child know...?
So this IS the average person's limit...
Shut up! Shut up! SHADDUP!
I can't believe you beat me...
Of course!
This should be interesting...! It's been a long time since I've had a chance to use my powers to their fullest...
Managing that girl must be exceedingly rough on you.
If it were not for Miss Yuffie, I wouldn't be facing him...
HAAAAH!

The rule is the best fighter on each floor will be your opponent... Although it's a five-storied pagoda, the fourth floor is the highest...In other words, no one has ever defeated me--Master of Weaponry!You still want to try...?
- Just come on!!- I'll pass!
I like you! Now watch...Weapon Change!
You don't seem like the kind of person who can make it to the fourth floor without a problem...
How unfortunate! It was over before I could even put all of my strength into it...
Shut up! Shut up! SHADDUP!
Wh, what...!?
Of course!
Splendid! Your level and skills have improved...
Oh, ho! You might not be as much of a child as we thought you were!
Of course. If WE lost to her...
You have defeated four of our best, but now you will have to face HIM......!
...Hm. You can do it......
D, ...Dad!?
I'm glad you made it this far, Yuffie!
Why, why are you......
I'll answer you by having you try your skills against me!Hold nothing back. Come as if you're trying to kill me! If you don't... then I'll have to kill you!
H... hey!
What are you doing! OMNI-Change! ......!!
Dammit......
Ohhh! And what was that!? Come back when you get more training!
I'll show you this time, you old Fart-meister!
Hmm? A slight improvement.Come at me with all you have! OMNI-Change! ......!!
...heave...... heave...
O... old coot... n...... ot... bad...
You've...... also...... improved...
Hah... Ha, ha......
Ha ha haaaaaa......!
Waha haaaaa......!
It's time I gave this to you, Yuffie...This is Leviathan Materia. Take it.
But, Lord Godo. The Leviathan Materia should only be given to the person who conquers and takes over this Pagoda. That is our custom...
CUSTOM, CUSTOM, CUSTOM... I'm so sick of hearing that!It's so stupid!
Silence, Miss Yuffie!
Then what 'bout the rest of you? You have all that power...Are you satisfied being cooped up in this tower?
Yuffie...!
You too, dad...! Just because you lost the war!And turning Wutai into a place like this!
...What do you want to say?
You turned Wutai into a cheesy resort town peddling to tourists...How dare you!? Da-chao Statue and Leviathan are ashamed!!
She IS a kid.
Wh, what did you say...!?
Yuffie!!Forgive me... It's all my fault...
What are you saying, Lord Godo!
Losing the war... turning Wutai into this. It was all my fault...
Lord Godo!

Silence!!Yuffie......I am the same now as I was before when I wanted the war.But, after I lost the war, I began to think...Is strength, only for defeating the enemy?...or just something to show-off to others...?Might begets might.That's the same way as the Shinra...

I knew you were looking for Materia for the good of Wutai.But, the reason I hide my strength now, is also for the good of Wutai...And now, I realize both are necessary...Strength without determination means nothing. And determination without strength is equally useless...!
Lord Godo...
You there, please take Yuffie with you!I perceive that you all have both determination and strength!
Jes' don't do nothin' funny to our Materia...!
All right. We'll take your daughter with us.
...after that, how can we refuse?
As long as she doesn't get in our way...!
If you put it that way, we can't refuse...
Hmm... You may come if you want to...
Well, just tell yourself you're on a big ship, and leave the rest to ol' !
All right, I don't mind.
Go, Yuffie!For the sake of strengthening Wutai!
Dad...
I'll take care of the Five Sacred Gods until you return!Go! And come back alive!
......Of course!
Yuffie, wait a minute.The Materia they all have...After their battle is over, you think they'll still want it?
Dad...!
Go! Survive till the end! And return!With the Materia!
Heh, heh... you bet!
Go! Survive to the end! And return to us!Mat-...Take care of the Materia!!
Miss Yuffie. Your feelings for Wutai are the same as Lord Godo's. Always remember that...
Fight so that you never bring shame on Wutai.
You say there's some unusual materia where the underground pipe is!?But, first you gotta get if from a monster and unless you use your head. You won't be able to do it.
Miss Yuffie. We pray for your success!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Welcome.How 'bout a Chocobo Lure materia?Each level it increases, makes it easier for you to find a Chocobo.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: You've already fought x times... ......zzzzz....... zzzzzzzz......Come on. You already escaped x times. ......zzz...... zzzzzzzzz......Large materia needs high level materia............ zzzzzz...... zzzzzzzz......

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: What're you groping around for!..................zzzzz......... zzz.......

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Who're you?Hmph. I guess it was fate that I woke up and met you. Here!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: There's a dolphin in the bay. If you get close enough and blow the whistle, it might come to you.If you want to get on the ship, why not have the dolphin take you?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: No... that tickles...No... Stop......Mr. Dolphin......

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: If you want to get on the elevator that badly, give me 10 gil!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: - Okay, I guess- No way!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Hurry up and get in!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: You're such a cheapskate.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: All I wanted was to become a pilot! It used to leave me speechless watching the Highwind in the sunset!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Someday I'll get to use my special pose in a real battle!Same here!! I'll keep practicing until then!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Hey! Yo! You want weapons?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: It just isn't a party without Rude!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Hey!! Stay out of the way!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Ever since I was late to that parade, they've been on my back everyday with basic training.I can't handle it anymore!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Hey! Stop yappin'!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Ugh... My eyes are tired... No, this is the time for me to really buckle down!Until I become SOLDIER First Class.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: ZZZZZ......Grrrrgh--- ---Grrrgh

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: You can't pass.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Hey!! Civilian!! Stay out of our training!!Go around them! And stay out of their way!!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: ...gulp... Going do---wn.This floor is the Submarine Dock...Those of you visiting the Underwater Reactor, please proceed through the connecting tunnel....gulp... We're here...

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Only authorized personnel are allowed past this point!You know too, right? About Junon Navy's important classified information.A new submarine has almost been completed using Shinra's top technology.A new version of submarine. I'll be sailing on it. Man, I can't wait!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Man...... It's so boring keeping watch at the Underwater Reactor.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: ...gulp... Going u---p.Returning to Junon....gulp... We're here...

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: I'm sorry. The bar is only for Shinra employees.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: I'm a good lookin' man once I take my uniform off.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Mommy... My mommy...

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Booze, booze! Ain't nothing like booze during working hours.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Welcome to the 'Inn'd of the line' in Junon. Wait, I shouldn't be sayin' stuff like that.Wanna spend the night?- 30 gil- Forget it

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Enjoy your stay.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Good morning! You still seem a little sleepy.Looking forward to seeing you again.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Come again.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: These barracks are for soldiers. This is no place for civilians.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: How 'bout a ship taxi? Only in Junon!Free to Air Force personnel!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: - Sure, call 'em- Nope

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Roger!! Hey! Taxi!!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Where to?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: - The next town- Outside Junon

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Right! The next town it is!!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Then outside Junon it is! Take care!!!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Just holler whenever you want a ride!If you get sick easily, maybe you'd better not go.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Lately it seems like the economy's been better. Must be the 'Rufus' effect.Cargo ships are always coming and going from Costa del Sol.Now I'll overlook the fact that you're a stowaway, but you better at least help with the cargo.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Hey, who're you? You look like you've been around the world twice.I don't know what your story is, but hang in there.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Today's a great day for a nap in the sun. It always puts me in a good mood!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Thinking of being stowaways?It's 100 gil to Junon. Give it to me, and I'll put in a good word with the captain.What'll we do?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: - Pay up- Don't do it

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Okay. Come on. This way.It's not the most pleasant ride but make the best of it.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Thank you. Come back any time you want to stowaway on our ship.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Ever since Rufus complimented him, he ran around for a while, And we haven't heard a peep from him since...

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Why's that!?Not yet!!Eaghhh!It's your fault!What's wrong with you!?You wanna go!?Whew!!!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: It hurts when you kick me with your bare feet!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Heh, heh, heh!...... My woman and me are getting along pretty good.But I'm such a pitiful waste......

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: ...sigh...... I'm not good enough for her. What I should do?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Always the same story... Women never pay any attention to me...

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: If this is your idea of flirting... forget it. I do fine as it is.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: The sea, the wind and the sun. Don't you just love the outdoors? It always puts me back on track.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Hey, good timing. Would you mind putting lotion on me?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: - With pleasure- Sorry

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Uhhhnn...Than--kyu!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Hey, loosen up a bit.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: ...No one's here. We'll come back later.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Huh? Oh another customer. You sure picked an out of the way place but...But if it's the "Keystone" you're looking for, you're too late. Don't have it.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Keystone?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: What? You didn't come here for that?The "Keystone" is the key that unlocks the gate to a very old temple somewhere.You're not going to believe your ears,But I heard it was the Temple of the Ancients!!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: The Temple of the Ancients...

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Kya, hah hah hah...Don't take it seriously. It's just a legend!Huh? What?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: - Where is this "Keystone"?- Where is the Temple?- Let's change the subject- Never mind

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: I sold it already. Yeah well, to tell the truth, I didn't really want to sell it but...That guy had a way about him that made you feel like it may not be a good idea NOT to sell it to him...

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Who did you sell it to?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: The manager of the Gold Saucer... think his name was "Dio". Said he was going to put it in his museum, then he took off out of here.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Come on... it's only a legend. But if it were true, that sure would be something, huh?Now that you mention it, I have heard of something called Ultimate Destruction Magicwas supposed to be hidden somewhere in the Temple of the Ancients.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Ultimate Destruction Magic...?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Come on! I told you not to take it seriously!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: All the weapons you see here I made myself. But lately I haven't been able to get materials...Hey you wouldn't happen to have any Mythril on you, would you? I'll trade you something good if you could spare some.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: - Give him some- Forget it

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Hey thanks! All right you can help yourself to either a big or small box.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Hey, don't just come bargin' in here!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: What? You want to rest?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: - Yep- Nope

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Oh all right. You can use that bed.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Welcome to Cosmo Canyon. Make yourselves at home.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Nanaki, are you leaving again? We want you to stay here forever...

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Welcome to 'Shildra Inn' As long as there are guests, our lights will always be on.It is 100 Gil a night. Would you like to stay?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. You people.Where is Nanaki? I hope he's not bothering you.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Would you like something to drink?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: - Let me hear your story

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Y'know, I heard Rufus rushed back to headquarters in Midgar...

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: How long's that guy gonna be in the bathroom? I need to go too...

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Oh, it's you? I heard you and the Captain really made a BANG!I also heard that Rufus was so pissed off he went on a rampage and that no one's been able to get near him!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: I heard Tiny Bronco broke...That sucks. I was secretly eyeing that thing. Broke, huh? What a drag.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Because those Shinra creeps locked us up in our houses, we couldn't even watch the rocket lift off.I never thought that my only hobby would be destroyed by that arrogant young Rufus...!

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: I'll take care of everything at home. But please take care of the Captain.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Welcome to Bone Village, a town for nature lovers.What do you want?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: - Have you seen Sephiroth?- What are you doing?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Oh, the man in a Black Cape. He was looking for the Temple of the Ancients.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: - The Temple of the Ancients?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: It's way down south. It's right on the other side between this town and the inland sea.It's the pyramid that rises within the forest.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: - How do you get in?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: You'll need a Keystone.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: - What's a Keystone?

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: Just like it sounds. A rock that's a key. I heard that some rich guy has it.

Chapter: The World - Before the Temple of the Ancients
Line: We're excavating. It's like the land's telling a history of the planet.

A buncha guys called Turks came here sayin' they'd pay 10000 gil for some rock called a 'Keystone'.When I asked how much they'd pay for a regular rock just layin' around here, they slapped me upside my damn head!!
I'll never understand the rich. I heard some guy named Dio at the Gold Saucer is collectin' rocks!
(at Wonder Square)What you are looking for is near.
I heard that this is the curator's favorite attraction. He likes it so much that he even has his collection displayed in the arena.
Are you here for the battle, too?
- That's the idea- Not interested
I like fighters. But hate those who're all talk.
Is that so.
Crap! I still don't have enough points.Mmm? You're new here, aren't you? Then, you want an explanation of the Battle Arena?
- Yeah- Not interested

You fight here and collect battle points. You can then exchange those points for prizes.The Battle Game... even though it's a game you still use all your physical abilities. To participate, go to the front and pay yer GP's.You can fight in up to eight battles. The more you win, the more battle points you get.But, if you lose, you lose all your points. So it's up to you whether or not to fight after each win.They also make it harder by givin' out handicaps.They decide what handicaps there'll be, and you won't know what you're up against until the battle.Oh yeah, once you leave the Battle area, all your battle points will become useless. So watch it.Oh, and one other thing. The maximum points you could get is 65000, no more. So if you get that many you should exchange them for something.
Hmm...So, uh, how've things been since then?
- No sweat- They're going
Hmm, pretty good.
Ha ha ha! Well, good luck.
Maybe I could've made it a little further. It's so hard to know when to stop...Man, I knew I should've stopped. But it's so hard to stop...
I'm not going to lose this time!All right, it should be my turn comin' up here soon.
Hey, have you heard? Something awful happened!Two staff members and some Shinra soldiers were shot.The soldiers died instantly, but the staff survived.
Dyne......
Register for battle? The registration fee is 10 GP.
- Let's do it- Not interested
This is a one-on-one battle. Which one of you will participate?
Well, I guess I'll enjoy a few battles.
I'm gonna bust the place up!
Let's make this quick.
I'll show 'em with a BANG!
I guess it'll be fun to show off what I've got.
I'll show you my moves!
Then, I'm off!
Hmph...I'll show them what real fighting is.
Let ol'  show ya how it's done!
Welcome. You currently have X battle points.Would you like to exchange them?
- Yeah- No, thanks
Thank you very much. Please remember, your battle points become invalid once you leave the Battle Arena.
Whenever you come to the Gold Saucer, I recommend you visit the owner's museum at least once.
"Star Cup""Weekend Clock""Laugh Sapling""Slayer's Pot""Chisa's Mask""Dio's Portrait""D Type Equipment""Zauger's Cup""Calling Gourd"
It's the Keystone...
Heh, heh, heh. Long time no see, my boy. Hmm? You like that, huh?
Can you let me borrow this?
Heh, heh, heh. Sorry, but it's not for rent.Hmm.Since you've been good to me in the past, I CAN let you have it on one condition.
One condition?
Heh, heh, heh. Entertain me!
- What'd you want me to do?- Not in the mood
Hoo boy!Heh, heh, heh. It's not something that's really difficult.This is the Battle Arena. Show me your fighting skills. Just you, my boy. I'm expecting a good fight!
I see... Then let's pretend that this never happened.
Heh, heh, heh! Well done, young man! All right, as I promised,you can take it. Oh, and I'll give you this too.
Hmm, you did pretty well, young man!Good, it's a promise, so go ahead and take it. I'll give this to you too.
That's the best you could do? Well, a promise is a promise. Go ahead, take it.
Well then, we shall meet again! Heh, heh, heh.
Excuse me, sir.I'm sorry. The Tram is out of order right now.
I'm really sorry!I'm afraid you won't be able to leave until it's fully repaired.
What's wrong?
Too bad. It happens, though.I know! Let's stay at the hotel! They know me here. I'll go talk to them.
I will let you know once the repairs are completed.
We don't usually get the chance to be together like this, huh?Cloud, how 'bout it? Can you tell us what's happened so far?I don't really know what's goin' on because I wasn't here in the beginning.
Yeah! I'm all for it!
Good idea.
I been here since the beginnin', an' I still don't know what the hell's goin' on either.Cloud, the hell's goin' on? C'mon, tell us!
- I'm tired...- All right, I'll give it a shot...
All we have to do now is sleep! You're still young! What're you complaining about?
Phew...We are going after Sephiroth.Sephiroth must be in search of the Promised Land.
The Promised Land?
A land full of Mako energy. ...or at least that's what the Shinra believe.I don't know if it actually exists.
The Cetras return to the Promised Land. A land that promises boundless happiness.
Cetra? That some kinda disease?
That's what the Ancients call themselves.Hey, didn't you listen to the elders at Cosmo Canyon?
...You don't 'know' where the Promised Land of the Ancients is.You search and travel, until you feel it. Like you just know, '...this is the Promised Land.'
Aeris... can you feel it too?
I think so.
So Sephiroth is traveling the world because he's searching for the Promised Land? Is that it?
That, and one other thing he's searching for.
The Black Materia...
I heard from Dio that a man in a Black Cape was lookin' for the Black Materia.
I don't even know what the Black Cape is...How many men with Black Capes and number tattoos are there?
...you know, of course... My tattoo is number 13.
How did you get that tattoo?
...Hojo put it on me. Everything else is just war scars, but the number was done by Hojo.
So there are at least 13!?
...You know......I think Hojo did something to those men in the Black Capes.But I don't know what it has to do with Sephiroth though...That's why I think we should just go after Sephiroth himself.
Yeah, me too! It's all just too damn confusin'.
And...I'm sorry, forget it!I think I'm tired. I'm going to bed now.
What was that, all of a sudden!?
What!? That's it? I'm goin' to bed!
Is that all? How 'bout the Black Materia?
You wouldn't understand even if I told you.
Now all we gotta do is take action! We're startin' tomorrow!!
Cloud...I'm number 13. Am I going to go mad too?
I don't know what Hojo did to you, but you've been all right so far, right?
But...
Be strong.
But, I...
Stop it, Nanaki! Be strong!
Tifa?
You're not the only one who's worried!
I don't know what's goin' on, but we're in a bad situation...
Hey Cid, let's go back to our rooms.
...zzzz... zzzz...
Hee, hee!
What's wrong?
You want to go on a date?
What?
A DA-TE! Or haven't you ever gone on one?
- Don't take me for a fool- Well, not a real one...
Hey...a little touchy, aren't we?
No, just a mixed-up kid...
Oh well, come on let's go...
Hey!
Tonight's Enchantment Night! All the attractions are free.How 'bout it you two? There's going to be an entertaining show in Event Square!
Come on, let's go.
Congratulations!!You are our 100th couple today!!You two will be the leads in tonight's show!!!!
Wha?
Oh, now, it's not hard. Just play it however you want to and the rest of the cast will cover up for you.Come this way.
H, hey!
This sounds like fun. Come on Cloud, let's do it.

Hey, it's your line.
Yeah, you.Ahem!Oh...... You must be the legendary hero... Alfred!I know in my soul. Please... please save Princess Rosa!Now......Please talk... to the King......!!

Oh...legendery hero, Alfred. You have come to save my beloved Rosa...Oh the peak of a dangerous mountain...dwells the Evil Dragon , Valvados... who's kidnapped Princess Rosa...But... you can't beat the Evil Dragon  now! Talk to the one who can help you......Who will you talk to?

Uuuuuuurrrrgghh!

Arrggaahhh!! Curses......The power of...love!!
Oh...look! Love has...triumphed!Now let's all return... And celebrate.

Oops! This looks like I came at a bad time!I'm  No. 2. Right pleased to meet you all!
HEY! Cloud, you #$#&@!
Cloud, what are you doing!?
Aeris, are you all right!?
Aeris! Cloud, what're you doing!?
Cloud!! What are you doin'!!
Cloud!
Cloud! What the hell are you doing?
Everything is white...What did I do? I don't remember anything...My memory... since when...? If everything's a dream, don't wake me.
Cloud, can you hear me?
Don't worry about it.
Oh...Then, why don't you REALLY worry about it?And let me handle Sephiroth.
What is this place?

This forest leads to the City of the Ancients... and is called the Sleeping Forest.It's only a matter of time before Sephiroth uses Meteor.That's why I'm going to protect it. Only a survivor of the Cetra, like me, can do it.
Aeris?
You look like you was havin' a nightmare.How are you feeling?
- I seem to be OK- Not good- Don't really know
That's good. Man, I didn't know what was gonna happen.
Oh... Better keep it to yourself.
I guess that's right. Well, don't worry too much about it.
You know, Cloud. Aeris is gone.
Everyone's out looking for Aeris.
......City of the Ancients. Aeris is headed there.
By herself!? Why did she go by herself!?Hey, we're goin' too.
Only the Ancients, only Aeris can save us from Meteor...
Then we must go. What'll we do if something happens to Aeris? If Sephiroth finds her, she's in trouble.
Sephiroth... already knows.
Hey! Why are you still sittin' around?
Let's go, Cloud.
No.
Yeah, godammit! It's 'cuz of you that Sephiroth got the Black Materia in the first place. It's your damn fault!
My fault?
I know you got problems... hell, we all do. But you don't even understand yourself.But you gotta understand that there ain't no gettin' offa this train we're on, till we get to the end of the line.
Cloud, we came this far... Aren't you going to settle up with Sephiroth?
(shaking his head)No...I'm afraid.If this keeps up, I may go crazy!I'm afraid...

Just a damn jackass, that's what you are...Yo, jes' think about it... How many people in this world do ya think really understand themselves?People get depressed in life because they don't know what's up.But, they go on living. They don't run away... Isn't that how it is?
Cloud... you'll come with us, right? I believe in you.
What... am I supposed to do?Pull out of here?Pull out? ...To where?
(from the next room)Cloud...
Wait a minute, Tifa. Give him a little time.He has to decide this on his own.You believe in Cloud... right?
......I'm afraid to find out the truth...? But...... why?
You awake?Those people were so worried that they stayed by your side until you woke up.You sure do have good friends.
Cloud...

Hey, how are you?I just wanna know, which is it gonna be?You wanna find out about yourself? Or are you afraid to find out?Either way, you stay around here and about all you can do is worry about it.Even if you do go nuts again when you see Sephiroth... If it happens, it happens.I'll go upside your spikey white head and bring you back to normal!
Cloud, it'll be all right. We're all with you.
But...
If it happens, it happens. Don't worry 'bout it.
...You're... right. ......He's right, isn't he?
Come on, let's go and find Aeris...?

Chapter: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Line: - I want a Lunar Harp

Chapter: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators
Line: Ask the guy in the tent below.

Chapter: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators
Line: We use the newest system to find buried treasure. We simulate earthquakes by using bombs, and then check the sound waves given off by the tremors.

Chapter: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators
Line: The forest just beyond here is called the Sleeping Forest. Right now the forest is asleep and anyone who wanders in while it's asleep, it confuses. You can go in, but you may never come out...But just now, a girl in pink and a man in a Black Cape went in. You think they'll be all right?

Chapter: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators
Line: The Lunar Harp is somewhere in the ground here. We could excavate it for you if you want us to.

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: (arms raised)Do not worry. Soon the girl will become part of the Planet's energy.All that is left is to go North. The 'Promised Land' waits for me over the snowy fields.There, I will become a new being by uniting with the planet. As will this girl......

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: ...Shut up.The cycle of nature and your stupid plan don't mean a thing.Aeris is gone.Aeris will no longer talk, no longer laugh, cry...... or get angry......What about us...... what are WE supposed to do?What about my pain?My fingers are tingling.My mouth is dry.My eyes are burning!

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: What are you saying? Are you trying to tell me you have feelings too?

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: Of course! Who do you think I am!?

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: Ha, ha, ha...... Stop acting as if you were sad.There's no need to act as though you're angry either.

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: Everyone, listen to me.I'm , ex-SOLDIER, born in Nibelheim.I came to settle up with Sephiroth.

Line: What're ya tryin' to say?

Line: ...Hmm?

Line: Why now?

Line: Why're you being so formal? Is something wrong?

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: ...You're right.

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: I heard that before.

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: I came here by my own free will... Or so I thought.However......To tell the truth, I'm afraid of myself....There is a part of me that I don't understand.That part that made me give the Black Materia to Sephiroth.If you hadn't stopped me, Aeris might have been......There's something inside of me. A person who is not really me.That's why I should quit this journey.Before I do something terrible.

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: ...I dunno, man...

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: ...But, Cloud.

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: ...All right, Cloud.

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: Leave it to me!

Line: Watch you?...... We're all in this together!

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: ...I guess so.

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: Well, we'll face it when it happens.

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: I don't know how Aeris tried to save the planet from the Meteor.And I guess now, we'll never know.But!We still have a chance. We must get that Black Materia back before Sephiroth uses it.Let's go.

Chapter: The City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice
Line: Hmmm...Sephiroth said to me... Head North............ past the Snow Fields......
It's almost finished!Next time, I'm gonna make an even bigger one.
Grandpa, wake up! We have a customer!!
...smack... mff... Oh... welcome, glad you came.
(on speaking to him again)You'll have a hard time selecting from all the good things we have!
My husband left 20 years ago and still hasn't come back.He should at least be at the foot of the Gaea Cliffs. It's marked with a check on the map...
Grandma, don't sleep so close to the fire!
I just get s-o comfortable.
The master is an experienced climber, you know.I've heard that he knows every corner of that Great Glacier!
It's nearly impossible to reach the Northern limits without a map.If you're thinkin' 'bout going to the Northern limits, you'd better take that map on the wall.
You heard about the gnarly hill in this town? They tell me it's off limits!
What luck! We came all this way... crap!
We came from Costa del Sol to snowboard, but we're just about to leave!
Phew, what is it? Don't get too close, or it'll burn ya.
It's colder than usual today...It's 200 gil, you wanna spend the night?
- Yes- No
Enjoy your stay!
Please come again.
Welcome! You look like a STRONG one...If you want, I could lend you an ear...?
- Yeah- Not interested
I got bored listening to his stories.
Am I boring you?
What's with you!? You make me sick!
If you go further North, I heard there's a Huge Crater.Something huge must've fallen from the sky a long time ago!
Oh yeah?
I've heard there's a snow woman, at the Great Glacier, that hates hot springs...But I think it's just a myth to scare off visitors.
I heard some guy went to the Great Glacier in the North.What an idiot. Is he thinkin' 'bout going to that hot spring?
He's probably gonna get lost in the glacier and freeze to death.No matter how well equipped he is, out there in that cold on the glacier, I give him two days at the most.
You thinkin' of going North?
- That's my plan- No
Well... if you're going past this town you'll need a map.Maybe there's one left at Mr. Holzoff's house. He used to be a mountain climber.
Yeah, we really don't have anything here, but make yourself at home.
Do you know what a Cetra is?
What was the Cetra......? Oh yeah, it's the same as the Ancients, right?
Yeah, a Cetra lived in this town a long time ago.Her name was Ifalna, and she knew about a lot of things...
Whadaya mean?
I heard she was abducted by the Shinra and was taken somewhere.
Shinra and the Ancients... I smell somethin' fishy...
WHAT YOU LOOKIN' AT!?You're a real freakazoid, aren't you?
(later)Eyaaaaaaaaaah!!!
Camera's ready!Then, Ifalna, please tell us about the Cetra.
2000 years ago, our ancestors, the Cetra, heard the cries of the Planet.The first ones to discover the Planet's wound were the Cetra at the Knowlespole.
Tell us Ifalna... Where is the land called 'Knowlespole'?
Knowlespole refers to this area. The Cetra then began a Planet-reading.
Ifalna, what exactly does Planet-reading entail?
...I can't explain it very well, but it's like having a conversation with the Planet...It said something fell from the sky making a large wound.
Do the Ancients, rather, the Cetra, have special powers to heal the Planet?
No, it's not that kind of power. The life force of all living things on this Planet becomes the energy.The Cetra tried desperately to cultivate the land so as not to diminish the needed energy...
Hmm, even here so close to the North Cave, the snow never melts.Is that because the planet's energy is gathered here to heal its injury?
Yes, the energy that was needed to heal the Planet withered away the land... then the Planet...The Planet tried to persuade the Cetra to leave the Knowlespole, but...
Ifalna... Let's take a break.

I'm all right... When the Cetra... were preparing to part with the land they loved...That's when it appeared!It looked like... our... our dead mothers... and our dead brothers. Showing us spectres of their past.
Who is the person that appeared at the North Cave? I haven't any idea.
That's when the one who injured the Planet... or the 'crisis from the sky', as we call him, came.
You don't look well... Let's call it a day.
Ifalna, can you comment on the thing called 'Weapon'?

Yes, Professor.The one the Professor mistook for a Cetra... was named Jenova. That is the 'crisis from the sky'.The Planet knew it had to destroy the 'crisis from the sky'...You see, as long as Jenova exists, the Planet will never be able to fully heal itself.
Back then, Weapon was a weapon the Planet produced of it's own will?
Yes, but... There is no record of Weapon ever being used.A small number of the surviving Cetra defeated Jenova, and confined it.The Planet produced Weapon... But it was no longer necessary to use it.
So, Weapon no longer exists on this Planet?

Weapon cannot vanish. ...it remains asleep somewhere on the Planet.Even though Jenova is confined, it could come back to life at some time...The Planet has not fully healed itself yet. It is still, watching Jenova.
Where is Weapon?
I don't know...... I can't hear the voice of the Planet well...Times... have changed. The Planet... is probably watching this situation closely.
...Thank you, Ifalna, that will be all for today...
What are you doing, Profes...... I mean, honey?
Oh, I'm thinking of taping it on video. But, the video's not working right...
What are you going to tape? Is there still something I haven't mentioned?
No, that's not it. I'm going to record my beautiful daughter.And when she's sleeping, her face... looks like an angel.
First, we have to figure out her name. We can take the video later!
I've already decided! If it's a girl, then it'll be Aeris. That's that!
You are SO selfish! But Aeris is a good name!Hee hee... it's a good name, considering it came out of that forgetful head of yours!
Right!? Oh, the video tape......
Video again? You just got through taping!
.........Please don't say it that way.It's our lovely daughter, both yours... and mine!Don't you want to capture her childhood on videotape?
If you keep doting on her like that, she won't grow up to be strong...Aeris is different from the other children. I wonder what dangers await her...?
Never say that! I will protect you and Aeris no matter what!!You and Aeris are my only treasures. I'll never let you go!!
I feel so much better now, darling.If I hadn't met you, I......
Who could that--I was just about to...Damn!!How dare they intrude on our 'private time' together!
I'll send them away.Yes, at once!!Who the devil?
Heh, heh, heh...... I've been searching for you, Ifalna... or should I say, Cetra!Long time no see, Professor Gast!
Hojo... How did you know?
Believe me, I had to turn over a stone or two to find you.Two years I waited... That's how much I wanted this new sample...... Ha, ha, ha.
...New sample? You don't mean Aeris!?
Hmm, Aeris? What a nice name...... Ha, ha, ha.
That's it! I'm severing all ties with the Shinra.Hojo, please leave.
Please, Aeris has nothing to do with it! All you want is me, right?
Ifalna!
I'll need all of you for my experiment.You understand don't you, Professor Gast? We can change the future of the Planet!
Don't worry, Ifalna. I'll take care of this!
Please don't put up a fight. I don't want any harm to come to my precious sample.Mmm? What a funny looking camera. Guard! Destroy it!
Be careful with her!! Ha, ha, ha......
Wh... what are you doing, Professor!?
Ifalna! Take Aeris and run!!
Eyaaaaaah... Darling......!!
Oh, and uh... don't forget the child!Hmm, a video? The Ancients... Weapon!?Heh, heh, heh... a mountain of treasure! Thank you Professor... Ha, ha, ha
No, don't!! It's a steep downgrade, past here.It's dangerous, please don't go!
- I'm still going- Thanks for your kindness
Damn, I was just being nice...What the? Who are those people over there? Looks like trouble!
No, no. I just did what came natural.All right, I'm not too busy now. Do you want me to teach you how to ride a snowboard?
- Maybe you should- Not interested
Do you want me to explain again?
- Yes, please- No thanks
You're so boring!
There they are, hurry!!
Yes ma'am!!
Cloud... huff... wheeze.I won't let you go any further!
What's down there?
It's a SE-CR-ET.It really doesn't matter! But you really got guts doin' my boss in like that!
You mean Boss...... Tseng? That wasn't us. Sephiroth did it.
No! Don't think you can fool me, liar!
I'm not lying... it was Sephiroth.
Don't try to act innocent. I'll never forget it!!
Oh, man...
Looks like talking alone won't cut it. You're going to have to feel some pain!
Just you... and me!!
No, I can handle him! There's no way he can avoid my punch.
What? Yeah......
Ele... Elena!?
What the...? They sure were weak for Shinras.
Why? Why didn't you try to avoid it...There's no way they can climb the Great Glacier anyway.Put them in some house in the village.
This village is now under martial law!
- (Do what you're told)- (Kick his butt)
Don't be angry. I'm just doing my job.
Stop it, there're kids around!Listen, I probably shouldn't tell you, but I hear something big's going down up North.The President's gonna be there. So, would you please just lay low for a while?
Who is that man?

Character: Man on Roof of Small House
Line: When I first moved here, I saw a man with a Black Cape heading North.It seemed strange seeing a Black Cape against the snowy white.
My boy got hurt right about the time we moved here...I never should've bought him a snowboard.
......whimper...... weep...I got hurt on my snowboard, and now I can't go out for a while...Hey, I'll give you my snowboard.
Tell me when you get good at it.
Sorry I just took off a while ago... It looked like there was going to be trouble.Anyhow, you'll need a snowboard to get down that hill. Want me to teach you how to ride one?
- Yeah, maybe you should- No, not interested
Do you want me to explain again?
- Yes, please- No thanks
All right, big-head... But don't blame me if you get hurt.
Be careful!
Ugh...
Of course.
Yeah, somehow.
Got snow in my ear...
God! I can't stand it!
A little off.
Yeah, I'm all right.
I can't be doin' this! Damn!

So where did we land?
Depending on the course they took,  will say any of the following:

Whenever I think of Cloud, everything gets all jumbled up.No matter how powerful Shinra or Hojo is, I can't believe they can create humans.But because of them, we know that Meteor is heading towards us......Y'know, even if I saw him, I don't have a damn idea what I'd do......

There appears to be a small island near the Lifestream......They said the Lifestream sometimes suddenly gushes out at the south island.I remember hearing about this from Seto when I was a child, but I don't remember much else......I'm sorry...... Tifa.
Everything appears calm right now at Shinra.So now's the time to look for Cloud.I'm worried about him, too.I wonder where Cloud is. Or could he already be......
Too much hope is the opposite of despair.An overpowering love may consume you in the end......
OK! You just signal when you're ready to fly full speed.
Eagggghh! Are we going?
- We're going- We're staying put
Eagggggh! We're off!

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Huh? You're looking for your friend? You want to know where the Lifestream is?Let's see, I can't help you with your friend, but I've heard about the Lifestream.When I traveled to the southern islands, a doctor was very kind to me. I seem to recall him telling me something about the Lifestream......

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Ah, youth... You really believe that big meteor filling up the sky's going to fall here?If that's the case then all we can do is put our hope in Shinra, Inc.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: They say the meteor is going to fall, but it's okay! I'm sure Shinra will come through for us in the end and do something!

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

"Guidebook"A rose that blooms once every 1000 years in the desert. ...... "Desert Rose"A harp that soothes those who hear it. ...... "Earth Harp"I wonder if there's anyone who'll bring it to me?

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: My dad still just sits at the bar drinking, even though he knows that Meteor's coming!It's sad. Even though he's an adult, he just doesn't want to see the world as it really is. I dunno what to do.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: I heard Shinra's taking all its biggest artillery from Junon and its various other facilities and gathering it in Midgar to fight the meteor and Weapon.What's going to happen to the world...?

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: (checking the Mako pressure)What're you doing checking the pressure of the Mako energy at a time like this? It's probably already too late......It's times like this when you shouldn't go into a tail spin. You've got to continue to live orderly just like before.At least that's what I think...

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Oh, what is that? What has this world come to? Stars falling and everything.With things the way they are now, how 'bout raising a Chocobo?No, I'm not trying to persuade you for money. It's just because of the state of things in the world.I thought that it would be a good and healthy thing for you to raise some Chocobos...Hmm... You just happen to be in luck!It just so happens that we aren't taking care of any Chocobos for anyone else, so...I could take care of 6 Chocobos right now, for 10000 gil per Chocobo. How 'bout it?

Currently, I can rent out up to 6 'Chocobo Stables'.If you rent a 'Chocobo Stable', we will keep up to 4 of the Chocobos you catch in the fenced area outside.At a later date, you can select the Chocobo that you would like to put in your 'Chocobo Stable'.'Chocobo Stables' cost 10000 gil...

Line: Thank you.My grandson takes care of the Chocobos. He's in the Chocobo Stable at the far right of the farm. Please tell him what you want.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Chocobos aren't hard to take care of.The day to day care will all be done here.But, please buy the food for the Chocobo, and feed them yourselves.Chocobo's abilities will differ with what you feed it, so feel free to choose your own food.Also, if you're able to find a male and a female Chocobo that like each other, they'll produce an egg. But only if you feed them a 'Nut'.New Chocobos inherit the abilities of their parents.I've heard that sometimes new breeds of Chocobo are born with special abilities. I've never actually seen it before, though.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: What the Chocobo eats are 'Greens' The most famous one is the 'Gizzard greens.'Chocobos will mature differently depending on which 'Greens' they eat. Certain 'Greens' will boost their stamina.You'll have to figure out what kinds have what effects for yourselves.Oh, and Chocobos are born with certain natural abilities. So no matter how much they mature, they can't get more abilities than what they're born with.Remember that if a Chocobo's abilities don't increase even though you feed it, that means its limit is reached.It's best to let those kinds of Chocobo go or mate them to get a new Chocobo.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Other than regular Chocobo, there are "Mountain Chocobo" and "River-Chocobo".In order for the "Mountain Chocobo" and "River Chocobo" to be born,You feed the "Carob Nut" to a "Great Chocobo" or a "Good Chocobo" and have it produce an egg.But we don't sell any "Carob Nuts".A "Great Chocobo" and a "Good Chocobo" are found...On an island Southeast of the Chocobo Sage's dwelling at Corel. And in the area west of Corel.The "Carob Nut" can be found south of the Chocobo Sage's dwelling. Monsters carry them.Let's see, is Bone Village just south of there?One surprise If you get the "Mountain Chocobo" and the "River Chocobo" to produce an egg,You'll get a Chocobo that can cross mountains and rivers. I bet that the right nut for that is the "Carob Nut."Bigger surprise: There seems to be a Chocobo that can cross the ocean.If you could cross the ocean, mountains, and rivers, there'd be no place you couldn't go.In order to get an Ocean Chocobo you need to get a Mountain-and-river Chocobo to mate with something else.If you mate the Mountain-and-river Chocobo with a "Wonderful Chocobo",You'll get an Ocean Chocobo. But to do that you can't use an ordinary Nut.The "Nut" that produces Ocean Chocobos is the "Zeio Nut".This is the first I've heard of it. I wonder where you get them?Zeio Nuts are found on a little island east of the Chocobo Sage."Goblins" have them. With this, you can produce an "Ocean Chocobo".According to my research, Mountain, river, and ocean Chocobos are hard to produce.But, if you take the right care of the Chocobo, and increase their Class ranking by winning at the races, it'll increase your chances of getting one.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: I almost passed out when I saw Weapon.It seems Weapon was beaten, but a Shinra soldier told me there are 4 more.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Once Meteor hits, not just the fish, but the whole ocean will be destroyed...

Line: Cloud fell into the Lifestream at the North Cave, and has been missing ever since.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Come on in!Welcome!!I just can't believe it. I never thought a monster like Weapon really existed.

Line: This machine hasn't been working right ever since Weapon got to it!

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Weapon and Meteor scared everyone else off, but I'm sittin' here soused as usual.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: I'm starting to feel like I can't stop anymore.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Hey! Stop yappin'!

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: I've been had!! I want to get in a real battle, too!

Tons of fan letters... My future's peachy!

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: I'm sorry. I've decided to close this place down.All my regular customers were killed by Weapon.Everyone was pretty weird, but I got a lot of memories of them.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Please! Come in...

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Welcome!

Line: I won't charge you for a smile...

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Please go to the counter.

Line: Why don't you surround yourself with young girls and have some fun... maybe for the last time.

Line: I hired more girls after hearing that the world's coming to an end, but I wonder if I made a mistake.I keep getting more and more in debt. I've got to get out from under it somehow. Maybe I'll have Weapon help me.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Thank you very much!

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: I used to be in SOLDIER. Recently, I've felt like dressing up like this...I don't know why, it's out of season, but...

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: (trying to cross his legs casually)I'm learning to be a delinquent soldier!!I just can't seem to get the hang of it! It just isn't going right!!

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: All the real soldiers were killed fighting Weapon.It may seem ironic that losers like me are still alive. But that's the reality of it.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: I only came to help with the transporting of Junon's Huge Cannon, Sister Ray, but...Now the company tells me not to bother coming back...What's being a Shinra employee all about...?Yeeeeee......If Weapon killed all the upper management... then I'll be President...!!

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Weapon was really something. Nothing can compare with his strength, but with a selection like this, our weapons'll win.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

I wouldn't have time for one now anyway because of that Weapon thing...I haven't had a girl friend in 18 years. And I'm a romantic! ......phew.

Line: Well, I'm not worried. When it all comes down, I'm heading for the skies.The only problem is...... will there be anywhere left to land?

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Live with the planet, die with the planet.Maybe this is the way it should be. Who knows? I'm full of booze...It's when I think about the children. I wonder if we could just save our own children.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: It's not that I'm afraid of that big star.It's just that, uh, I have a stomach ache... That's why I'm not moving. That's the truth!

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Welcome to 'Shindra Inn'. It's times like this a nice, soft bed will do you good.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Welcome. You still want more weapons? You sure are weird...Uh, I mean, it's weird. if there weren't people like you, I'll be out of business. Heh, heh, heh... sweat...!

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Mm... oh, this? This is the book of Stars. I'm just finishing it.Nothing is meaningless. If I do this then, someday, someone will run across it.The Ancients did the same. That is how we know about them, right? Maybe my book also......

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Oh man... Everything is over, once the meteor hits...I've been selling Materia for 10 years now, ever since I was 16. What have I been doing with my life...?Welcome! Oh, it's nothing. Now, please make yourselves comfortable!

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Hmm... I wonder what's going to happen now...

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Don't worry, mom! All of us just need to go through that door!Mr. Bugenhagen sealed it so we wouldn't have to worry about it!But what's a seal...?

Line: Ho Ho Hoooo....no time to be humming now. The planet is nearing imminent death.Where is Cloud? Wasn't he with you?

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: That's why we're here... Cloud... Cloud has...

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: I see... Cloud has......It's true that there are several places on the planet where Lifestream is gathered.But most of those places are below the surface where humans cannot reach them.There's only one place. An island floating in the Southern Sea...What did you say? I haven't left here in years... No good. I can't remember.In the Southern Seas I think there was an island where Lifestream is.But even if you find Cloud there...Life's dream is a mass of spiritual energy,and one person alone probably couldn't stand against such an incredible spiritual current...

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: How can you shop at a time like this?What? 'Me, in business'?Don't worry, it's all right. I get paid by the company.My real job is to protect the secret of Nibelheim.What? Secret?We don't have a clue. But it's all right.It's all over anyway!The end, the end, the end!! Yeah, even as we speak, Meteor...! The End...!

Line: When that big star bashes into us, both Wutai and Da-chao are going to be dust! Can't we do something?

And are impervious to the strongest flames.But of course I don't think they'd stand up to the fire that huge eerie-lookin' Planet's gonna make when it crashes into us...

Line: - Are you going to run away??- What are you doing?

Line: Whoa...!...Consciousness of the Ancients?

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: The reason for the drop in temperature must be because of that dome of light at the Northern limits...You all should get away from here and go to a place like Mideel Island in the south.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: I wanted to get a lot better at snowboarding...

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Cough... cough... I've been living in this town for 60 years. And STILL I caught a cold...I heard there's a doctor on a Southern island somewhere. I sure wish he'd come here... cough... cough...

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Grandma's been sick for a while and doesn't have much energy lately...

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: It's the first time that the temperature has dipped this low, this fast...There's also that mysterious light at the Northern limits too. Does it mean that we've reached the end of the world?

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: With all the strange things happening in the world, I kinda understand why people want to leave...

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Maybe we'd better leave town soon too.Let's go to that island in the South! What was it called...... hmm?Yeah, yeah, I heard that there's a town called Mideel on a southern island.

Line: I'm still in here! All right!?

Line: I heard that there's a barrier on top of the mountain.What's a barrier? You mean that light on the top of the mountain?

Line: There's a barrier at the North end of the crater! You shouldn't go any further.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Ho ho. It's unusual for people to come to such an out of the way place...I can't remember how many years it's been since the last person came.

Line: Who are you?

Line: Me? I'm......I don't know.

Line: (no one would forget that)

Line: Where can we catch one?

Line: Where can we find one?

Line: ...... That's one right there isn't it?

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: What about that one right there?
