Line: What're you flappin' about? There's one right there!

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Wha? I wonder what he's doing there?Can't remember for the life of me...

Line: So where's this chocobo?So where can I get some of these 'Carob Nuts'?

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: So where is the chocobo?And what about those nut things?

Line: Oh, OK. I remember! That chocobo......It's on an island southeast of here, In a place called Corel surrounded by greenery.You should be able to catch one just west of Corel. And some 'Carob Nuts', too......There used to be some monsters just south of here that had them. Or you might............... Funny...... What was I saying just now?Can't remember for the life of me...

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Oh right!It was about the Mountain Chocobo and the River Chocobo I told you about.When you mate these two together......you get one that can cross rivers AND mountains.And... And also... uh, what was I saying?Can't remember for the life of me...

Line: Oh, yeah! And also...There's one that can cross oceans, too!

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: You probably don't remember but...How can I get one of those Chocobos?

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Line: Oh, I remember! The Ocean-crossing Chocobo is...The Mountain-and-River-crossing Chocobo is...... is... Oh, what was I saying?Let's see now... ...Nope. Don't remember a thing.

Line: Right, right! I remember! You take the Mountain-and-River-crossing Chocobo...Mate it with a 'Wonderful Chocobo' you can catch right around here... And you'll get...Can't remember for the life of me...

Line: Oh yeah! Zeio nuts were...The favorite of goblins. There's a small island east of here where the goblins have a bunch of them.

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: I think......that's all I'm gonna remember.Oh!That's it...

Chapter: The World - After Meteor is Summoned
Line: Wh, what the hell was that!? That came buzzin' past here like a powerhouse!

Ahoy! Hey ain't you a beaut. This here's Mideel. It's a quiet little Hot Springs town.Just the perfect place for old folks like us to live out our lives.I hear that things ain't so peaceful on the outside. But here it's still nice and quiet.
But anyhow, that overgrown moon is going to fall down on us isn't it?This's no joke! We've got to start stocking up on supplies before they're all gone!Outta the way! Hey, move it, move it!
What is it? You're being awful friendly all of a sudden.Oh, so that's it. You want the Samolen Greens... don't you?- Give it some Samolen Greens- Don't give it any
Well, okay. Here, go ahead and eat.
hee hee... how cute! I just want to tickle him.- Tickle his feet- Tickle his stomach- Tickle his neck- Tickle his belly button- Tickle behind his ears- Tickle under his arms
Oh, you scared me...! I thought you were dead!
Sorry, little guy. I can't give you any.

Welcome! We always welcome cash! Now, about where you want to go...I'm afraid other customers have already booked it up. There's nothing left.......just kidding! Just a little joke. Now what can I do for you?Thank you! Come again!

Gather 'round, gather 'round, this is a bargain!!We've got the best armor and weapons, the likes of which you won't find anywhere else.But it's first come first served, so get yours now!Step right up! You there, don't just stand around outside.Go on in! Come on! Don't be shy, step right up!I'll never know why he wanted to open a store in a dead town like this. What's up with him......? ...sigh......

Everything must come to an end. And someday it's gonna be your turn. Even the world's gotta end sometime.Everybody leaves at one time or another. And everyone gets left also. That's just fate...It's sad, but there's nothing that can be done about it. So that's why I'm prayin' like this for all of you.
Huh......? What could that be?There's something stuck deep inside that looks like a key... It's hard to get out.Well, I'll just let it go for now......

You again! You aren't here hoarding up goods too are you?Don't reach in front of me! Everything in this store is mine!I've got money to burn! I've been saving it like mad just for a time like this!C'mon, outta the way! Move, will you? Move!
Welcome to the charity store, a store of love and courage! What can I get you today?Thank you very much! Please come again.
No good... I wonder if it's locked?
I wonder if there isn't some way to get this outta here...?If I just move this...... And push that...... Okay! I got it out!
You say you don't know when the stars are gonna fall outta the sky? Is that for real?I still don't believe it! How could this be happen?

Ancient Weapon? End of the world? I don't know nothing about that! I'm gonna live to be a hundred!There's tons of stuff I still gotta do! This's just the beginning.And what have Shinra and SOLDIER done about it? Tell me! They're a waste!!
Actually, I'm a beautiful maid. I just work here in the accessory store part-time.Everything here can compare with the best goods anywhere. So, how about one?Thank you. Stop by again.
Oh yeah, shall I try that old beat up key?- Use the beat up old key!- Forget it
Is something wrong......?
Ulp!?Huh? Uh, no......What am I gonna do......?- Lie your butt off!- Tell them the truth!
Oh... why, thank you very much.
Whew... that was close. But that was kind of bad...
Huh? Key? You mean the one to that door?
Hah, hah, hah! That's a good one!

???
ShopkeeperOf course there's no key. It's a wall. We just painted a door on it.
What!? It's not a real door?
ShopkeeperThat's right. We drew it on there to make it feel like you could pass through it to another world.Sorry to have surprised you. It's not much of an apology, but please take this.
Really? Thank you.
 and the others received "Cursed Ring"!
ShopkeeperIf possible, we're hoping to pass through a dream door like that one into another worldI got the feeling that you all might be able to make my dreams come true in my place. Weird, isn't it?
Of course there's no key. It's a wall. We just painted a door on it.
What!? It's not a real door?
That's right. We drew it on there to make it feel like you could pass through it to another world.Sorry to have surprised you. It's not much of an apology, but please take this.
Really? Thank you.
If possible, we're hoping to pass through a dream door like that one into another worldI got the feeling that you all might be able to make my dreams come true in my place. Weird, isn't it?

Huh? Never seen you here before. You from outta town? How're things on the outside?Between the earthquakes and Meteor...... It just might be the end of the world like everyone's been sayin'...Oh, how depressing! What a miserable world this is......

Ohh...... there's not much time left!! You never know when that moon is gonna come crashing down!!When it all comes down to it, this world's about money and material things!If you got 'em, you can get by whenever, wherever!Gotta buy!! Gotta buy, buy, buy!! I'm gonna shop till I drop!!
Ah, welcome to you! What I get you to-day?Thank very much! You come 'gain.
What's the matter? Are you all alone?
......guess it's been about a week now since he washed up here on the shore... Poor pokey-headed young thing...
It was really sad...... but weird. He was holding this really long sword.I dunno. The whole thing feels unlucky to me. But the amazing thing was those weird blue eyes......
Wha!?
Yeah... a villager found him a little ways down the coast... It was about a week ago I think.
Yeah, poor kid...... He must've drifted from somewhere pretty far away...
Cloud!! It must be!! It's Cloud!!
You sure!?
Over here!
BINGO!!
Jackpot!
You've found him.
Heh, good job, Tifa.
So where is he? Is he safe!? Where is he now......?
Yeah... up ahead here... At the, uh, clinic......
He's alive...!Cloud...... Cloud's alive!!
Uh......!? Yo, Tifa!!
Halt!
Oh, HEY!
Wait up!
Cloud!?
Here now. The way you're running around here, you'd think Meteor fell or something.
I'm sorry, but I heard that a friend of mine was being taken care of here......
A friend...?Oh yeah......! That young fellow!?Don't worry. Your friend is next door. But I'm afraid his condition is...
Here?Over here.
Oh... Cloud!! I'm so glad you're safe!?......!?Cloud......?
Wh...... what's wrong...... Cloud......?
Cloud! What happened to you......!?

Mako poisoning...... Quite an advanced case......It appears this young man's been exposed to a high level of Mako energy for a protracted period of time.He probably has no idea who or where he is now......Poor fellow, his voice doesn't even work. He is literally miles away from us.Some place far away where no one's ever been... All alone......
Doctor......!!
That's bad......
How horrible......
You lyin' or what!?
That's terrible......
Damn...... that's evil.
Cloud......
Ahem! Let us excuse ourselves.Listen, would you all mind...... waiting outside?

Why......? What do you want me to do?Please, Cloud...... Talk to me......Tell me you see me, that you can hear me...... Tell me, please......I came this far believing in the memories we have together...This isn't happening......! This is too cruel......Oh, Cloud......! I............
So what about him? You know...... Cloud?
Tell me doctor, is Cloud all right? I mean will he heal?
Hey doc, is he okay? Is he gonna heal?
Hey doctor, is Cloud all right? Is he gonna get better? Come on, tell us the truth.
Listen Doc, why don't you tell us the truth.What about Cloud? Is he all right?

I'll say it again, he's got Mako poisoning. I've never seen a case this bad...An immense amount of Mako-drenched knowledge was put into his brain all at once......No normal human could have survived it...... It's a miracle he did!
No wonder...... After fallin' in the Lifestream an' bein' washed up here......
No wonder. He fell into the Lifestream and was washed up here......
No lie. After fallin' head first into the Lifestream.
No wonder. After falling into the Lifestream......
No wonder...... After all he fell into the Lifestream and was carried down here.
But remember, the light of hope can be found anywhere.Listen, if you give up hope... What will happen to him?
Hmm, I know he'll recover! Cloud was a strong member of SOLDIER.
Yeah, that's right. Besides, WE'RE here for him. He's gotta get better!
Yeah! I know Cloud'll get better!With friends like us worrying about him He can't go wrong.
......... Hope............I guess that's all that's left for us now......

......hope......Hey, but honestly, man...... Do I really want him to come back?What did he do for the world? What can he do for us from here on out? He may be nothing more than Sephiroth's shadow......
Is something wrong?
No, nothin'. Nothin' at all, doc.
You okay?
Are you all right, Tifa?
You okay, Tifa?
You all right?
You okay?
Yes...... I'm sorry I had you all worried.And I have something I want to tell you all......
I don't care about anything else, only Cloud......I...... want to be by his side......
Yeah, that's probably best......For Cloud...... an' for you......
Yes, that's best!
You gotta do it then. You gotta live true to yourself.
If Tifa was my nurse, I'd switch places with Cloud any day!
Do what you wish.
Yeah. Right. Hang in there, Tifa.
I'm sorry, everyone... At a time like this......
Why you apologizin'? We'll come back again an' check on ya.
That's all right. We'll be by again.
No big, no big. I'll pop in again later.
What're you talkin' about? Not even. We'll stop in again.
Don't worry. We'll return and check on him later.
Don't worry. I'll stop by again sometime.
You take care now, Tifa. And take care of Cloud.
Do your best, Tifa. Take care of Cloud.
Look after Cloud. Take care, Tifa.
Hope Cloud gets better soon.
Take care of him.
You hang in there, Tifa. Take care of Cloud.
Right......
Oh, and uh, Tifa... I don't like askin' this but......Is he really your childhood friend? And not Sephiroth's shadow?
Huh!? Well... that is......No, I'm sure of it!
Yeah......? Okay then...... Sorry for askin' that.
We gotta get back to the Highwind.
We should be getting back to the Highwind.
Hey, shouldn't we be gettin' back to the Highwind?
Well, I guess we'd better go back to the Highwind.
Very well then, we should be getting back to the Highwind.
Now, we gotta be headin' back to the Highwind.
What're we gonna do now! What can WE do?Huh? Ain't there nothin' we can do?An' don' go tellin' us to wait for Cloud to get better.
Oh, I've got some news.
Yeah, what!? That you a spy?
Yeah...... I've already told you I was.Both gya ha ha and Kya ha ha, are up to something.Wanna eavesdrop?
Now then...... We're faced with two issues.1 Destroy Meteor. 2 Remove the barrier around North Cave and defeat Sephiroth.Any ideas?
Gya haah hah hah! We already solved the first problem!Meteor will soon be smashed to bits!The plan has already been put in motion. Namely, to collect Huge Materia from each region.
Well......

Huge Materia is a high density special type of materia made through a special compression process in Mako reactors.The energy extracted from it is 330 times the strength of normal materia.Ha, ha, ha! How about that!?We will gather all the Huge Materia together and ram it into Meteor.That will cause a huge explosion!! Reducing Meteor literally to bits.
You're going to ram Meteor?Do you think we have the technology to do it?
Don't worry about that!More importantly, we've got to collect Huge Materia from each area.
We've already collected materia from Nibelheim.All that's left is "Corel" and "Fort Condor".I've already dispatched troops to Corel.Ghaa haah hah hah!
Corel!What else can they do to Corel!?

And the Huge Materia......You mean the Huge Materia, don't you? I've heard about it.When, our small materia nears the larger one, something should happen.I'm certain of it.That's why we're using the power of materia in our fight......
Can't let Shinra get a hold of the Huge Materia!Besides, when Cloud gets back, I wanna show him this Huge Materia. He's gonna be shocked.
So, what are you saying, Barret?Even though you're always knocking him, you really want Cloud to return.

I ain't sayin' nothin' 'bout nothin'. You just... shut your face!Every group's gotta have a leader.An' that's me!Or at least I wanna be... But I ain't cut out to be no leader.I never knew that till lately.An' that's what is......
You been chosen to be the new leader.
Pain in the ass. Forget it.

I never was in SOLDIER.I made up the stories about what happened to me five years ago, about being in SOLDIER.I left my village looking for glory, but never made it in to SOLDIER......I was so ashamed of being so weak; then I heard this story from my friend Zack...And I created an illusion of myself made up of what I had seen in my life......And I continued to play the charade as if it were true.

I'm physically built like someone in SOLDIER.Hojo's plan to clone Sephiroth wasn't that difficult.It was just the same procedure they use when creating members of SOLDIER.You see, someone in SOLDIER isn't simply exposed to Mako energy.Their bodies are actually injected with Jenova cells......For better or worse, only the strong can enter SOLDIER.It has nothing to do with the Jenova Reunion.But weak people...... like me, get lost in the whole thing.The combination of Jenova cells, Sephiroth's strong will, and my own weakness are what created me.Everyone knew that. Well, now what?- Read the manual- Sit in the seat- Leave it alone

Radar Screen: The mines are found at the top of the indicators on the screen.The basic strategies are to 1) avoid the indicators, and 2) "Lock On" to enemies from behind.The lower gauge shows the sub's remaining power. The right gauge shows the sub's speed. Other warnings are as follows...WARNING... Enemy submarine detected nearby!ALERT... Approaching torpedo detected!MINE... Mine detected nearby!CONFLICT... Collisison with the ocean floor!
Everything seems set...- Read the manual- Start the mission!
This switch...?
Phew--! We did it!!The Huge Materia should be at the bottom of the sea by now. Let's continue the search...
Hmm...? ...Must be from Shinra.
Is it us?
No. 2......I saw that written at the dock! They must mean this sub.
We're Submarine No. 2
Oh my gawd...! They mean us.
We need to respond!
We've no choice but to respond.
Make 'em shut up! Just answer somethin'!
All right, I'll do it.This is Shinra No. 2... Everything's normal.
Junon Airport... We should make it if we hurry.Forget about the Huge Materia for now.We're climbing!
Shit! What's all this 'Climbing!' crap? Gimme a break!
Aye, aye... CAPTAIN!
Take o-ff!
Climbing...arrrgh...my ears...! LET ME OUT---I HATE THIS---
We gotta hurry!
First the ocean, now the air... What a busy day.
The airport? No sweat!
We're gettin' outta here!
Hear that? Junon Airport!We can still get the Huge Materia back! Let's hurry!
We're breakin' out of here!
Whatcha gonna do!?
But how? We're at the bottom of the sea!!
I can't swim...
I wanna get outta here, now!
What we gonna do?
We're at the bottom of the sea.
Damn! What are we gonna do!
We're gonna hop on a torpedo and blast outta here!Don't worry! I won't miss!We don't even have a target. We're just aiming for the sky.
Old man...
Yo!! Junon airport?
Just in time!Come on! Let's go to the airport!
Ugh. It's salty! Let's go to the airport!
Phew... The air up here is great!Hey! Let's go to the airport!
Let's go to the airport!
It seems as though we made it. You'll probably head for the airport, right?
God!! I'm drenched!Hurry up! Let's get to the airport!
Hmm... Junon.I'd love to get my hands on a submarine right now.
Yeah! I could go for that! Let's go to the submarine dock under Junon!
There should only be a few guards now.It might be safe to go to the submarine dock under Junon.
I would like to ride it! Let's get one from the submarine dock beneath Junon!
...Yeah!!The submarine dock underneath Junon! I can steal sub easy enough, but forget about me piloting it!
Security's pretty light now! The submarine's at the submarine dock!
It should be alright.
You want it? Then you gotta have it! They're down at the submarine dock underneath Junon! You gotta get what you want while you can!
Let's go...
This is the Junon Submarine Dock!If you want to enter, please talk to my dog.That's all the instructions you're going to get! Let's go!!
Damn, Shinra dogs!!We'll take that submarine!! Out of our way!!
Shinra dog...!!- Ignore it- Dognap it!
Feelin' lonely!? You'd better get back to your master.
Shinra dog!! I'm gonna dognap you!!
Those attackers won't bother us now.
P... Please!! Spare me!!
Hmm......- Take them all hostage- Fight them
Be grateful. I'm taking you prisoner.
You're pretty nice!Thank you!
Don't think we're weak.
We can't go back after coming this far.
An unconditional surrender, huh?- I'm your prisoner- Don't bet on it...
Let me show you how it's done.
Captain... I can't hold on any longer!Eyaaarrrgh!
Uggh... They got me.
The Special Pose...
We'll hide it somewhere secluded.
It seems like there's something going on again up there.Is that huge plane going to take off again with that deafening roar?
I just saw some Shinra soldiers all huddled together discussing something.They said a plane carrying Huge Materia would be taking off from the airport above.

Character: Soldier on the Path to the Airport
Line: Finished loading the Huge Materia!All we have to do now is to ready the cargo ship, 'Gelnika', for departure and we're done!
Oh no! The Huge Materia...
Let's go after it!
Can't we go after it?
Let's get there before they do and catch 'em!
How 'bout us getting there beforehand and stealing it back?
Let's go after it.
Grrrrgh! Just barely! We're goin' after it!
But where to?
Where are they headed?
Where's their destination?
Hey, where? Where? Where are they headed?
Where is it flying to?
Where is their destination...?
Where's that thing headed?
Rocket Town, of course.
Whew... I hope everything goes all right until we get to Rocket Town. Then, our mission is nearly complete.
Not so fast. We still have one major task... we still have to transport the stuff...
The stuff...

Character: Soldier on the Path to the Airport
Line: I'm glad we got Gelnika to the Rocket Town safely.But they sure think big. Looks like they're going to use the Huge Materia's to break up Meteor...
So this is the Leader Sub...Damn...... makes me sick just thinking about it...
...Phew... That's good to hear.
This is the Shinra's Gelnika type airplane... I wonder why it went down here?
What is this place...? Must be some kind of a Research Establishment because there's a Mako generator?
Turks!?
...again?
We just seem to keep running into each other lately!There were weapons and Materia developed solely to destroy Sephiroth.
...but, it was attacked by Weapon and sunk to the bottom of the sea.
I can't give you what's here. We'll take out Sephiroth.I guess this is our last meeting.
I won't let you get in our way.
These guys are pretty tough.
So Shinra's new, secret weapon was on this Airship...
This must be the Cargo Room...This is terrible... It's all messed up...
It looks like a key to somewhere...It seems really old.
Several thousand years... ...Ancients?
Them Shinra guys think they're gonna fight Meteor with the Huge Materia?
How are you feeling?You ought to rest a bit... Don't push yourself.
Shinra only cares if things are good right now.But, I plan to live for 500 years and won't stand for that type of thinking.
Them Shinra's ar' all gathered at Cid's Rocket Town...Yep... there ain't nuthin' I like more than lettin' out secrets.
...how does it feel, Cloud? Living for yourself and not someone else?
You said there's somethin' goin' on at Rocket Town...?
Hmph!......I wonder why anyone would ever make an airship like this......Ugh...... ugh......
Wanna go?
- Go- Don't go
Seems like Palmer of Shinra, Inc. ordered soldiers to restore the rocket...
Even with all this goin' on outside, that guy still won't come out of the bathroom? He must be a damn water tank!?
What's young president Rufus doing by getting all those mechanics together?
The Shinra serious 'bout launching that piece of crap rocket? But why now...?
There's a bunch of Shinra people here messin' with the rocket...Is my rocket... all right?
Hey Cid! I just thought of the best joke! Listen to this one.
I'm so sick of hearing these dumb puns, but okay... let's get it over with. Go on... let me hear it.
Uh, now, let's see, how did it go......He's crude an' a jerk...I mean, He's Rude of the Turks!
And?
President Rufus, lathers Tantrics...Uh, I mean... President Rufus, gathers mechanics...Raunchy meat, a pocket full, at the cafeteria. Uh, I mean... Launch a beat up rocket full of Materia.

Character: Barret, Tifa, Nanaki, Yuffie, Cait Sith, or Vincent
Line: (A fearful sense of humor...)
(The problem starts way before his sense of humor.)
...I thought it might be fun to hear some of your stupid puns again for old times sake... my mistake.
Oh, 'crap-again' (oh, captain).
Dammit! That does it!
How rude...
Rude, hell! You're the one who always cracks those #$##@& jokes!
(lying on the floor)Ugh... Nice kick.
Mmmmm, a SPECTACLE.
Is something about to happen? Oh, I'm getting excited.
Those terrorists are here!
Don't let them get any further! Everyone, ATTACK---!
Urrrgh, you're not going anywhere! Uh un, nowhere!
Wait, Cloud!If you're gonna kick those *#$% Shinra out of my rocket, then take me with you!ALL RIGHT! Let's show those &$!@& Shinra!
Goddammit, what the hell do they think they're gonna do to my rocket!?I'm outta here, Cloud! I'm gonna kick those $^%$# Shinra right out of my rocket!
Cloud, what are you doin'!? There gonna launch the rocket!!
Mmmm, here comes some hard action!
What? You guys are terrorists? Wow, that's kinda exciting!
...you again?...We will eliminate everyone who gets in Shinra's way.
You... you! Why are you here? Rude of the Turks should've been here!!
Too bad. Those guys are over there.
Oh man... the Turks, being done in like that... But, I won't let you through!
urrrrgh...
Hey! What the hell're you guys doin'!?
Hey! Just when I thought somethin' was goin' on, you come back!
Listen to me, Captain. We're gonna launch this rocket!
Huh? What are you talkin' 'bout?
We're gonna load a Materia bomb in this and blow up Meteor.
Our rocket's gonna save the planet!
Urrrrgh. Man this is so COOL!!
Wait a minute!
Shut up!! Just shut the hell up!
It's pretty much OK.
But...
We planned to run it into Meteor on Auto-Pilot, but the most important device is broken.
Broken? How's the repair goin'?
Shera's doin' it...
Oh great! What a buncha wizards you guys are! She's gonna take a 100 years!I'll take over, so don't worry about the Auto-Pilot!Hey, go ahead! Go tell everyone!
All right, Captain. Good luck.

Hey, Cid! What're you doing!?There are generations of knowledge and wisdom inside the Materia.We're gonna borrow their powers and save the planet from Sephiroth.There's no way that we can lose the Huge Materia. You understand that, right?

Yeah, I understand. I understand that Materia is precious, and I also understand what you're thinking.But listen.I don't give a rat's ass whether it's science or magical power.No, I guess if I had to choose, I'd rather put my money on the power of science.Humans who used to only roam around on the ground are able to fly now!And finally, we're about to go into outer space.Science is a "Power" created and developed by humans. And science just might be what saves this planet.I was able to earn my living thanks to science. So to me, there's nothing greater!Now quit your worrying 'bout what Shinra's gonna do!I don't want to regret not having done something later.
But, Cid......
Shut the hell up!! I don't wanna hear it!!Alright, time to get to work! Anyone who ain't involved, get the hell outta here!
What the hell......? What the hell happened!?
(over the intercom)Hey-hey!
Palmer! What the hell did'ya do!?
They said they finished repairing the Auto-Pilot. So, I laun---ched it!
Goddamn Shera! Why'd she pick today to get fast!
Hey-hey-hey! Almost lift off!
What the!? No countdown!? It just don't seem the same without it!
Hey!!!! Hey-hey!!! Blast-----off!
I finally made it... outer space...Let's see, how's the course set...?Yup, it's headed for a collision with Meteor.
Can't we do somethin'? We can't jus' leave it.
Can't we do something? If it goes on, we're......
What should we do? Are we all going to die?
Hey old man! Do something!
What shall we do? What shall we do?I'm a toy, so I don't care, but for all of you it's a different story...
We're in space now. A long rest...
That damn Palmer went outta his way to lock the Auto-Pilot device. We might not be able to change the course.
...this is the end?

Huh? What the hell're you sayin'? You're still young, and you give up that easily?I'm not gonna crash into Meteor.Just watch.I keep an Escape Pod on the rocket just for emergencies like this.I deciphered the lock code on the Escape Pod. We'll bail right before we crash into Meteor.
Hey wait a second!What's gonna happen to the Huge Materia?
Hey, what about the Huge Materia?
But, what are we going to do with the Huge Materia? Are we just going to give it up?
Hmm? What are we gonna do with the Huge Materia?If you don't want it, maybe... you could... give it to ME!
By the way, what are we goin' to do with the Huge Materia?
Then the remaining question is what to do with the Huge Materia.
......If you want the Materia, do whatever you want!The Materia should be there after you climb that ladder.
...You sure?
I dunno...I know what I said a minute ago.But maybe all that I really wanted was just to go into outer space.So, why don't you all do whatever you think is right?
Hey, Cloud.If you're goin' to get the Materia, it's this way.
I finally found the Huge Materia...

It's structured so that the lock can be opened if we enter the passcode from this control panel.Hey Cloud, you know how to use it, right?Everytime it says, 'Enter Passcode,' push one of those O X   buttons.If you punch in the right code, it'll unlock and you can get the Huge Materia!
So, what order am I supposed to enter the passcode in?
I dunno. Just try and punch in the code randomly.
Whoa, pretty good! You got the passcode in a single try!You must've known the passcode. If not, it's impossible.

Seems like you missed the code!If we don't enter the correct passcode before the Protection System activates, we won't be able to get the Materia back!I heard there's a passcode only the top people in Shinra know.We probably have to enter that. Try and enter some codes while I try and remember that passcode!I think the first digit wasn't a .I think the second digit wasn't an X...The second digit wasn't a . I'm sure of it!The third digit was an X ......I think.I'm pretty sure that the last digit was a . No, maybe it was an X...?I have a feeling you push the O only once...Did you use the ? I'm pretty sure you didn't...I think there was a key that you have to push twice...Hmmmmmm, I can't remember. Give me some more time!
Alright, Cloud!! It's unlocked!Yup, my great advice saved the day.
Ahhh &$#$#! The Protection System just activated!...Cloud, too bad, but we gotta let it go.
Grrrgh!Damn! My leg's stuck in the debris......
Cid!!
...damn! ...can't lift it!
...I can't! It's so heavy, I can't lift it...
I can't do anything with my strength alone......!
I can't budge it by myself!!
What shall we do--- It won't budge!
...no. I can't lift it.
Don't worry 'bout me. Hurry up and go! If you don't hurry, the rocket's gonna crash into Meteor!
...I can't go without my friends.
You ^%#@&%......! No time to worry 'bout other people!
I'm gonna do whatever I can.
You're stupid. You're really $#&^%$* stupid.Tank Number 8 blew up...... So Tank Number 8... really was malfunctioning......Shera... You were right.But, ......this is the end for me.
Don't say that, Cid.
Huh!? Shera!?
I tagged along. I'm coming to help you.
You stupid &$#&%*%&%#!!......Sorry.
The Escape Pod is this way. Please hurry.
Hurry. I'm going to detach the Escape Pod.
Hey, Shera! Does this Pod really fly?
It'll be OK. I've been checking it till now.
.........Then I'm relieved.
......Thanks.
(plastered to the window)So this is...... outer space...Man... it's the real thing... I'm really here in outer space...So long, Shinra No. 26...
Rufus and the others plan was a failure...
What a bust... But I kinda hoped it'd work.
We been botherin' them as much as we can...But there ain't no other way... Wonder if we've been wrong all this time?
Makes you worry, doesn't it?
Don't worry! Think!
Hey! The girl's right.You start worryin' and there's no stoppin' it! Things just start fallin' apart and get worse and worse.
You're pretty damn optimistic! You up to somethin'?
Yeah, I been thinkin' about this and that.All the time we been up here lookin' at the planet.I been thinkin' even when we were floatin' in the ocean in that escape pod.
I've... been thinking too. About the universe... planet... ocean.How wide and big... No matter where I go and what I do it won't change a thing.

Maybe you're right.But I came up with something different.I always thought this planet was so huge.But lookin' at it from space, I realized it's so small.We're just floatin' in the dark. ......kind of makes you feel powerless.On top of that it's got Sephiroth festerin' inside it like a sickness.That's why I say this planet's still a kid.A little kid sick and trembling in the middle of this huge universe.Someone's gotta protect it.Ya follow me? That someone is us.
Cid... that's beautiful.
Yo! Cid! You even got to me!Do, now what? How're we gonna protect the planet from Meteor?
...............I'm still thinkin' about that.
Huh!?Did you...... hear something?
The planet's scream...... or Meteor...? Is it this planet?
Hey, how do we know that this is really the planet's scream?
Did you forget?Bugenhagen told us.
Bugenhagen...
Let's go see Grandfather! To Cosmo Canyon!I'm sure he'll be able to tell us something that will be helpful!
That Bugenhagen guy... He was a weird old dude.I thought he was some kinda naturalist, but he was all into them machines.
Did Bugenhagen...... tell you anything?
Hurry, hurry! We must go meet Grandfather!
This's just between you 'n' me but...That there Bugenhagen feller, used to be a pretty handy Shinra worker.Yep, he ain't never bought no weapons or Mako though......

The machines in Cosmo Canyon were presents of Dr. Gast.Wrapped up in the planet's strange notions surrounded by Shinra-made machines...Science and the planet lived side by side in that old man's heart.
Maybe it's just me, but has this ship been remodeled without me knowin' it?All these switches and levers. They're kinda gettin' to me.
What? Are we there?I know it's all for Wutai, But I can't take much more of this.
Shall we go?
- Let's- No, let's not
Even though they failed to blow up Meteor with the rocket, the Shinra haven't given up yet...Looks like they're gathering all the weapons from all their bases and are preparing for a final showdown.
OK, which is it gonna be? Meteor hits us first, or that guy comes out of the bathroom?I'm not movin' from this spot till I see it with my own eyes.
Even the rocket launch wasn't all THAT great.
Now that one of Shinra's greatest events is over, I guess it's back to the same old boring everyday life again...
Is Gramps gonna stay like that even though rocket's gone?

My, my precious rocket... It's gone.Hmph, I know. No matter how much I look, the rocket's still gone.But I just can't stop it. Just call it an old man's folly if you will.Sorry to get you into this. For me, it's a kinda hobby.But, out of appreciation, let me give you this.
I wish you'd take care of it and use it...Maybe it's time for me to get a new hobby...Mmm. You know that Shinra sports car at Cid's house? It might be fun to try and restore that thing...
I get so restless now that the rocket's gone. And now that we can see Meteor clearly, ...I can't stand it.
I still can't believe that piece of crap rocket actually made it into space... I guess the mechanic was a genius.
I got to learn more... Devotion, devotion.
Now all we have to take care of is Meteor, right? You should be able...Excuse me... ...Please take care of the Captain.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Line: SOLDIER? What about them!?Damn! If they really were from SOLDIER, they would be doing something about all this!!

Line: The trick to bein' a real man, is not to fart around, but to let everyone know where you stand, right off!

Line: Heee, ...... The Shinra have occupied this shop!

Line: Hmm? Let me see that.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Cid! What did you do!?

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Don't get mad, you'll just get more wrinkles. Hey, something's comin' out.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: I wish I could live with a real cat.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: We're not leavin' this city no matter what happens.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: It's a weird world we live in, so eat up and work hard.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: I don't know what's gonna happen next, But first, you gatta fill your stomach.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Seems like everything has frills on it.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: These days, you've got to have strength. Come on, you should work out.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Oh, so you're back? I got something good for you. Why don't you buy it?

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: You probably just found it lying around somewhere, right?

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: I'll admit that I found it, but you may never be able to get another one like it again.How 'bout 129,000 Gil for it?

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: ...What kind of price is that?- Oh, all right... I'll buy it- No, I don't want it

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Hey, much obliged. You'll never regret it!

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Hmm, that's too bad. This's really something.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Listen to me! Something really big's happening in Midgar.They were just saying on TV it was Rufus second strategy and...That big cannon's pointed due north...... You think the target's...... Sephiroth?

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Sephiroth put up a huge barrier around the North Crater.Rufus wants to use a mammoth cannon to smash the barrier.He plans to have Shinra troops rush in and attack Sephiroth after the barrier falls.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Everyone at Shinra's in an uproar because they heard Weapon's coming.I heard a big hydroplane carrying secret weapons, got attacked by Weapon and was sunk at sea......

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: I heard a war's about to start! And that's why they're moving the big cannon!

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Listen Cloud, I'm over the hill, but Priscilla is still a child.Isn't there a way to protect at least her from Meteor?

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: The Shinra Army's gathered at Midgar. Now it's just a matter of time Sephiroth's dead.What... me? I don't mind. I'll just wait here. My life is important to me.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Hmmm? Back again, Mr. Know-it-all!?All right! You can enter!!

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: No, no, NO!! Meteor's getting bigger by the minute!!I wanna live on the edge right now! I want to build a home with my woman and grow old together!If you can't do it, I will! And that's that!I'm gonna do my best, so you hang in there, too!

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Hey, the Gold Saucer reopened!We've got to play hard to get our minds of Meteor.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: I'm gonna use all my life savings before Meteor hits!

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: I know how you feel, but what if Meteor doesn't hit us? What are you gonna do then?

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Oh, you forgot? It's all right. Ahem!First use the [Select] button to choose either AUTO or MANUAL.In other words, either you control the Chocobo or let it run on its own.But it's pretty hard to make the Chocobo run the way you want it to. If the Chocobo doesn't like you, it won't listen.You can't really help on this one.But, most of the Chocobos that I'll provide you with are mellow and you should be able to handle them.When you're riding, use the [] Button to Speed Up and the X Button to Slow Down.But, if you go faster than the Chocobo can handle, it'll lose its stamina really fast.And use the Directional button to move the Chocobo left and right, use the O Button to get a boost of speed.Of course your stamina runs out faster though.There are some bad tempered Chocobos that can't pace themselves and they'll lose their stamina pretty fast.For those kinds of Chocobos, you should set the controls on Manual and slow it down.Finally, some advice for the restless, once the first and second Chocobo cross the goal line,Push the [Start] button to end the race.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Welcome. No matter what happens in this world, The Ghost Hotel will always be in business.Uuuuuuuuuugh......For reservations, please step up to the counter.Uuuuuuuuuugh......

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Hmmm...What, you too? With the way things are in the world, It makes you wonder what we're doin' here?Well, it's a little late for me to run around now, so I do what I love, it works best for me.Oh, by the way, did you know? I heard that there's going to be a battle and only the strongest will be allowed to participate.But what do they mean by 'strongest'? If ya ask me I'll say it's 'weapons.'But, there's gotta be a way to measure this too. Mmm, we need another way to measure strength.

Chapter: The World - After the Rocket's Failure
Line: Look we can't go to the cliff! So just give it up!!
Sephiroth... | Vincent...
Sephiroth... | Vincent...
Sephiroth... | Vincent...
That voice? It can't be...
Vincent......?
(running towards her)Lucrecia!!
Stay back!!
I'm against it!! Why experiments on humans!?
She and I are both scientists!!
Urrrrrrrrgh!!
Lucrecia... You're alive...

I wanted to disappear... I couldn't be with anyone... I wanted to die...But the Jenova inside me wouldn't let me die...Lately, I dream a lot of Sephiroth... My dear, dear child.Ever since he was born I never got to hold him, even once...Not even once. You can't call me his mother... That... is my sin...
Back!! Stay back!Vincent... Won't you please tell me?
If Sephiroth is still alive?I heard that he died five years ago. But I see him in my dreams so often...And I know that physically, like myself, he can't die so easily.Please, Vincent tell me......
Lucrecia... Sephiroth is dead...
Lucrecia......
Ho Ho Hoooo. If you ever are in need of my wisdom, you are always welcome here.
Yeah, that's why we came.

What to do? Have you lost your way? When that happens we each have to take a good long look at ourselves.There's always something in the deepest reaches of our hearts.Something buried, or something forgotten.Remember it... Whatever that is, must certainly be what you are all looking for...
That's easy enough to say... But, I can't remember a thing.
It must be there. Look harder!
This ain't no good with just us! Cloud, we gotta get some others in here.
...no good. Cloud, let's have the others come.
nghh... no good. We alone cannot do it. We need to have the others here.
You expect me to know that? Let the others do it!
How about it, Cloud? Shouldn't we have the others come?
I don't know, Cloud. I think we should have everyone here.
Ahh, no good. Cloud you call the others in here too!
Do you see it? What is it that you are searching for?
Nope. Not a thing. Naw. Can't come up with a thing.
Me either! I don't get any of this!

I remember Aeris a lot.No... not that.You haven't remembered.You haven't forgotten.That's not it...How would you say it... Aeris was right there all along. Right by our side.She was so close, we couldn't see her. What Aeris did... The words she left behind...
That reminds me... I was the same.
......as was I.
Me too...
She said she was the only one who could stop Sephiroth's Meteor.
But Aeris is gone.
Is it impossible for us to carry on... what Aeris tried to accomplish?
We ain't no Ancients, if that's what ya mean.
What, did that girl go off to that place?
That's it!!
What's it?
We don't know about it.What did Aeris know?Why did she face Sephiroth without running away?
I see... She returned there once again, correct?
Hmmm. Perhaps I'll have you take me there.
You're going too?
What's so surprising about that...?Even I want to get out from time to time and see the outside world. I wonder what did it? I haven't felt like this in ages.
It must be the planet. The planet is calling you!
Yeah, hoo boy, the planet calling... right.
Ho Ho Hoooo. Then let's go.
Oh yeah, Bugenhagen. I have one more thing I want to ask you.We're carrying around Huge Materia. This is pretty delicate stuff and we would like to keep it in a safe place...
Ho Ho Hoooo. Then we'll put it upstairs. Now, shall we be on our way?I'll teach you how to work the machine. Watch carefully now. You just pull this here...
Ho Ho Hoooo. Is this what you call Huge Materia...?This is really rare Materia, indeed.Materia this rare is certain to have a special consciousness enclosed in it.
Huge Materia...It is glowing strangely...- Get closer...- Leave it alone- Go back down
This color... it's the same color as magic Materia.
This color... it's the same color as command Materia.
This color... it's the same color as summoned Materia.
Is that... Bahamut...?
Ho Ho Hoooo. Good. Now let's leave.Do you remember how to use the machine down below? If you ever want to see Materia, come here anytime.

Hm, hmm, hmm!.......Smells like machinery.I love this smell.Of course, I also love the smell of nature, too......Hm? Is the deck up there?Then I'll be on the deck just passing the time.I can feel the workings of the planet in the smell of the wind.I also feel the greatness of man's wisdom and the knowledge in the smell of machinery...Well, bye for now.

Cloud...... urp...... ugh.You know, I was thinking...... phew...... Why does materia always have something to do with battles or magic?I bet the Ancients must've always been fighting.It must've been... ugh... terrible...
And Aeris... she's dead.Guess she turned into spiritual energy and returned to the planet, huh?But even if she did, there's no way we'll meet her again...
I wonder what Aeris felt... when she was on that altar...?
I'm sure she wanted to give her life for the planet...

Really? I wonder? I don't think that's it at all.I think she didn't think she would die at all, but that she planned on coming back all along.She always used to talk about the 'Next time'.She talked about the future more than any of us...Although she never talked about it to us she must've had a rough life...I think Aeris looked forward to tomorrow and the future more than anyone......she must've had many many dreams......
Aeris used to pat me on the nose sometimes.I used to hate being treated like a child like that, but I also liked the attention.I wanted to apologize to her for what I did when we first met.
I went an' told Aeris' Mom about her death.Yes, an' Miss Elmyra was cryin' herself silly... So was little Marlene...
City of the Ancients...The Ancients... after a long time that is probably what others will come to call us...Hmmm... hwa ha ha ha... It's only a matter of time for us.
Aeris...?I wanted to give her a ride in the Highwind......
Okay then, let's go!
- Let's go!- Wait a sec......

(in the observatory)I hope great Bugenhagen will take care and not overexert himself.'Ho Ho Hoooo.' I may be light, But I'm not as young as Nanaki.Oops. That will only get you angry. You're just like me. Ho ho ho.
Both Nanaki and Mr. Bugenhagen are gone... I feel so lonely...
Sorry... I'm really sorry. But now, I have......

Aeris' words came into my dreams...She said, she was the only one who could stop Sephiroth...... And to do that, there was a secret here...That was Holy...... That's why, she had the White Materia. Aeris knew about here... and what she had to do.Aeris has left us great hope. But, it cost her her life... her future...I'm sorry... Aeris. I should have figured this out sooner....You left us without saying a word...... It was all so sudden, so I couldn't think...That's why it took so long for me to find out... But, Aeris... I understand now.Aeris... I'll do the rest.

WHOOA-- Weapon's attacking!Run for your lives!!
What happened to...... Sephiroth?Northern Cave...Let's go see what happened to it.
When AVALANCHE was jes startin', we used to put up flyers everywhere.And now, we're up against Sephiroth. How about that?Feels like a long time ago.
Now we're going to fight Sephiroth.I wonder what the inside of that cave looks like? You think Sephiroth is just sitting there waiting for Meteor?
Will we save the world if we beat Sephiroth?I'm frightened, but I'll do my best. Let's hurry to the Northern Cave!
......Wonder what that Sephiroth feller's up to?
Defeat Sephiroth... Defeat the son of that beloved woman...Am I on the verge of committing another sin......?Or am I atoning as best I can for only watching...?
Maybe this is the time?
What's the pilot like?Tell him  says if he pilots the plane smoothly, give him my autograph...
Hey, Cloud!!!
- Y, yeah, let's go!- U, uh wait
Sephiroth's energy barrier is gone......Cid! Can the Airship get inside?
Huh? He's my student, ain't he!? Of course he can go anywhere!
Right, sorry about that.
Yo, Cait Sith! Now what?
Hold it!Scarlet! Heidegger! What's going on?
Strange. I can't reach the President!
Not the President. To Sister Ray!
Ha, ha, ha. What is it Reeve? You're speaking strangely.
None of that matters!The reactor's output is increasing all by itself!
Ww, wait a minute. That's not wise!It must cool for 3 hours or it won't work. Reeve, shut off the machine!
We can't do that! It's inoperable!
What about the mainframe? Who!?
Huh? Why are you giving orders?
I don't give a damn about the details!!
Ha, ha, ha...... Just you wait, Sephiroth.I'll give you all the Mako you want.
Hojo, STOP! The cannon, no, Midgar itself is in danger!
Ha, ha, ha...... One or two Midgars? ...it's a small price to pay.
Hojo! HOJO......!!

Show me...... Sephiroth.It should be near...Ha, ha, ha...... Go beyond the powers of science...Before your presence, science is powerless...I hate it, but I'll concede to it.Just... let me see it.Ha, ha, ha......
YO! Do somethin'! Ya big cat!
We're sunk. Hojo's doing this on his own.........? ...? H, huh!?I don't like this......
You're busted, Reeve!Too late tryin' to hide it now...
Can't you stop the Mako reactor?
......We can't stop it.
You're from Shinra, ain't ya? So why's it impossible!?
We came a long way to get here. You better not double-cross us now!
I can't make you trust me......
You damn fool! Don't you understand anything I'm saying?I don't give a damn about Shinra. If you're a man... no, if you're a human being, you'll save the planet! Don't you even care?
No way! If we shut down the reactor, all hell will break loose!!
Why? Can't you just shut off the valve?

Yeah, it's easy to shut off the reactor's pipe valves......But the reactor made a path for the energy to escape from below.Once you open that, it'll be impossible to close it until everything blasts out...And we can't try to stop the energy from gushing out......
An explosion!!
This blast'll be way stronger than when the number 1 reactor blew up!
Damn...!
Forget about that......... the CANNON! We've got to get to Midgar! That's the first thing!!
Must stop Hojo... first.
Looks like Cloud and the others are on their way. Stay out of the way!
Ghaa haah hah hah!Don't be so ludicrous! I don't recall you giving me any orders!The Peace Preservation will give their best effort to make the enemy retreat!Because of them, I...... I...!
That's a private matter......
The President is dead! Now I'm doing things my way!Ghaa haah hah hah!
Ha, ha, ha.Heidegger! Now I'm going to use the new weapon!
Hey! Wait!!Cloud, everybody! Sorry......But!!
But!But you'll come, won't you!?
I know!
Hey!I'm leaving the ship in your hands!
I'm heading for Midgar!
Comin' and goin'... gettin' pushed around.But I got a debt to all them back in Midgar that I can't never repay...
It's all right.You're here... Everyone's all togetherTogether... we can do anything. We've worked this hard already.
I wonder why Hojo performed so many of these experiments?Why couldn't he content himself with quiet research?
I can't 'pologize to y'all enough.If I was just a bit more o' a better feller Ain't none of this woulda happened...
Hojo... what a queer fellow.Such utter lack of scientific talent... compared with the genius of Dr. Gast......Lucrecia chose him trying to protect him...Now I understand... I understand... but...
We're busy runnin' back and forth!Even my bikini goddess would be pantin' about now!
Headed for... Midgar?Uh, a, anywhere's fine... I don't care. Just hurry up and land this thing.
Yo, Cloud! Whacha gonna do?
- Move it!- Wait
We've reached Midgar!
Even if we get there, Midgar's under martial law!There'll be no way we could slip into the slums.
Looks like all transportation from the slums is cut off......
Hey, hey, whaddya think we have Highwind for?Where are we now!?
Huh? Where are we...?
If land's no go... We'll go by air!
Okay then! We'll parachute into Midgar!!
Here we go!!
Heidegger is going after you all.That's why it's dangerous out there. Let's go underground!
Sounds strange comin' from me...But it feels like home bein' back in Midgar.Kinda makes me sick...
We sure got to know the Midgar underground.
I have an old score to settle with Hojo, so let's hurry and go!
This place smells gross. Let's get this over with!
So it was Hojo who stirred up all this commotion, after all these years...?
Yeah! Let's get it over with!
This is where we go in.
Leave this to me! Hurry to the cannon!
I smell it! The cannon's not this way!
Dead end!
Oh no! They're here!
What are we going to do!? I think it's okay for you to ignore your orders now.
...Elena, don't act so weak.
We're Turks, Elena.
...Yes, sir. You're right.
Come on, we've got work to do.
I'm not really up for it, but...
Our orders were to seek you out and......Kill.Our company may be in turmoil, but an order's an order.That's the will and spirit of the Turks! Believe it!
What are you doing! Let's go!
- Okay, let's end this- No, let's not go
I know we have a weird relationship, but...We have to end this... like Turks!
Try this on for size!Yeow! That hurts!Take THAT!!
(on defeat)Reno! Elena! Let's pull out!
(on defeat)Let's call it a day.
You showing pity!? Don't take the Turks for fools!
Wait, Elena.
Reno! You're not violating the order... are you!?
Shinra's finished. It's come down to this.
Rude...
Elena, you were a great Turk!
Farewell. If we both survive...If we can save our lives...
Remember the spirit of the Turks...!
Our mission's finished...
C'mon, c'mon, c'mon, c'mon---!
I'm all right! Hurry and go to the cannon!
Which way...!?Goddamn, piece of $#@^% cannon!!
No, no! The Sister Ray's not this way!
Welcome... to the fully automated store. Place your order... now.
.........Is it broken?'- BANG on it- Give up
What the... hell is that!!?
This can't be...
Are you serious...?
Hey-hey! You serious...?
No, no way...... I didn't know they completed it...
G'yaaa, Haaa, Haaa!!! Here they come!G'yaaa, Haaa, Haaa!!! So they really showed up!
You sure did treat us like dogs up to now!!
You killed off a lot of my precious soldiers!
G'yaaa, Haaa, Haaa!!! But let's see how you do against anti-Weapon artillery!
You guys are worthless, but my proud creation is a sure thing!
I'll show you the destructive power of the Proud Clod!
Not that! This is the proud Clod.........!?
Whoooooa!!
We don't got any time! Please get on with it!
This way, Cloud!
(on a lower platform, watching)Damn! Hojo...!
Hey! This is...
This is great. Hold on, Hojo......!
Hojo! Stop right there!!
Oh... the failure.
At least remember my name! It's !

Every time I see you, I...It pains me that I had so little scientific sense...I evaluated you as a failed project.But, you are the only one that succeeded as a Sephiroth-clone.Heh, heh, heh...... I'm even beginning to hate myself.
None of that matters... just stop this nonsense!
(pausing)...nonsense?Oh, this?
Why!? Why do that!?
Quit asking me why, you moron.Hmm... actually, you might be cut out to be a scientist.
...your son?
Ha, ha, ha... Although he doesn't know.Ha, ha, ha... HA, HA, HA...!!What will Sephiroth think when he finds out I'm his father?Always looking down on me like that.HA, HA, HA...!!
Sephiroth is your son!?
Ha, ha, ha...I offered the woman with my child to Professor Gast's Jenova Project.When Sephiroth was still in the womb, we took the cells of Jenova...HA, HA, HA!!
I can't believe you're the one who did this...The illusionary crime against Sephiroth...
Heee, hee, hee, hee! No you're wrong!It's my desire as a scientist! Heee, hee, hee, hee!
......I was...... wrong. The one that should have slept was......You, Hojo!
I... was defeated by my desire to become a scientist.I lost the last time as well.I've injected Jenova's cells into my own body!Heee, hee, hee!Here are......Heee, hee, hee!...my results!!
Gwah, haw, haw!!Haw... now let's seehow the Mako juice is reacting?
Anyway... that's the end of the cannon...
I can't believe Sephiroth is Hojo's son...
The father...
How sad... for him...
Hojo...rest in peace...
I'm so glad you came.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Shinra's...... finished.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Meteor's gonna fall in about......

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Seven more days. That's what Grandfather said.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Nanaki......You want to see everyone in Cosmo Canyon again?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: (turning to Barret)You want to see Marlene, right?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Don't ask me that.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: We'll beat Sephiroth...Then, if we don't release the power of Holy in seven days......There won't be a planet left to protect.If we can't beat Sephiroth...It's as good as death for us.We'll just go a few days sooner than the rest who'll die from Meteor.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Don't be thinkin' you're gonna lose before ya even fight!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: No!What I meant was...What are we all fighting for? I want us all to understand that.Save the planet... for the future of the planet... Sure, that's all fine.But really, is that really how it is?For me, this is a personal feud.I want to beat Sephiroth. And settle my past.Saving the planet just happens to be part of that.I've been thinking.I think we all are fighting for ourselves.For ourselves... and that someone... something... whatever it is, that's important to us.That's what we're fighting for.That's why we keep up this battle for the planet.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: You're right...It sounds cool sayin' it's to save the planet.But I was the one who blew up that Mako reactor......Lookin' back on it now, I can see that wasn't the right way to do things.I made a lot of friends and innocent bystanders suffer......At first, it was revenge against Shinra. For attackin' my town.But now......Yeah. I'm fightin' for Marlene.For Marlene... For Marlene's future...Yeah... I guess I want to save the planet for Marlene's sake...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Go and see her. Make sure you're right, and come back.All of you. Get off the ship and find out your reasons for yourselves.I want you to make sure. Then I want you to come back.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Maybe ain't none of us'll come back.Meteor's gonna kill us all anyway. Let's just forget any useless struggling!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: I know why I'm fighting.I'm fighting to save the planet, and that's that.But besides that, there's something personal too...A very personal memory that I have.What about you all?I want all of you to find that something within yourselves.If you don't find it, then that's okay too.You can't fight without a reason, right?So, I won't hold it against you if you don't come back.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: What are you going to do, Tifa?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Did you forget?I'm... all alone. I don't have anywhere to go.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Everyone's gone...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Yeah, we don't have anywhere or anyone to go home to.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: You're right...But... I'm sure someday... they'll come back, don't you think?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Hmm... I wonder...?Everyone has an irreplaceable something they're holding on to...But this time, our opponent...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Hmm... But that's all right, even if no one comes back.As long as I'm with you... As long as you're by my side... I won't give up even if I'm scared.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: No matter how close we are... We were far apart... before this.But when we were in the Lifestream surrounded by all those screams of anguish, I thought I heard your voice......sniff... you probably don't remember this...But deep in my heart I heard you calling my name... Or at least I thought I did...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Yeah... At that time I heard you calling me.You were calling me back from the stream of consciousness in the Lifestream.After all, I promised. That if anything were to ever happen to you, I would come to help.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Cloud...? Do you think the stars can hear us?Do you think they see how hard we're fighting for them?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: I dunno... But...Whether they are or not, we still have to do what we can. And believe in ourselves...Someday we'll find the answer. Right, Tifa?That's what I learned from you when I was in the Lifestream.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Yeah...... that's right...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Hey Tifa...... I...... There are a lot of things I wanted to talk to you about.But now that we're together like this, I don't know what I really wanted to say...I guess nothing's changed at all... Kind of makes you want to laugh...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Cloud... Words aren't the only thing that tell people what you're thinking...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: ............It's almost dawn...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: H, huh...?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Sorry. Did I wake you...? It's almost dawn, Tifa.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Umm... G, good morning... Cloud.Give me a little longer... Just a little bit longer...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Yeah... okay.This is probably the last time we'll have together......

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: I see......I think I've heard about it, too.At that time, it was Tifa's voice......

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Cloud...? Do you think the stars can hear us?Do you think they see how hard we're fighting for them?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: I dunno... But...Whether they are or not, we still have to do what we can. And believe in ourselves...I'll find the answer someday. As long as I keep trying.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Yeah...... that's right...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: We've got a big battle tomorrow, we'd better get some sleep...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Umm. Yes, I guess you're right......

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: ............It's almost dawn...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: H, huh...?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Morning, Tifa. It's almost dawn...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Mmm...... Good morning, Cloud.Give me a little longer... Just a little big longer...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: We'd better go.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: But, I still...!?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: It's all right, Tifa. You said so yourself yesterday.At least we don't have to go on alone.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Yes... That's right!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Okay! Let's go!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: The airship is too big for just the two of us.Yeah, it's a little lonely without everyone.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Don't worry. It'll be okay.I'll make a big enough ruckus for everyone.Besides, I'm the pilot.No more flying around casually like before.We won't have time to feel lonely.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Huh!?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: It's moving......

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Barret! Cid!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: O, oh...... is that okay with you?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Nanaki!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Why didn't you tell me!?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: But, you know, Cid.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Hey, Nanaki.If you butt in now, you never know what they'll say later......

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: ......Were you listening?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Vincent!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Why such a puzzled look?You don't want me to come?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: No, it's just that you're always so cold. I thought you didn't care what was happening.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Cool?Hmm...... I guess that's just how I am, sorry.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Well lookey-here. The Shinra Manager's come back.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Uh, excuse me but...I wanted to come with the main group, but I couldn't get away......So some people in Midgar took me in.I know I have a stuffed animal body, but I'll work really hard!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: I guess that's everyone.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: No, Yuffie's missing.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: She ain't gonna show up.'Least this time she didn't steal our materia. Guess we gotta be thankful for that.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: How could you say that!?I came all the way here after being seasick as a dog!I didn't go through all that just to have you guys have the best parts all to yourselves!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Welcome back, Yuffie.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Gee, Cloud...... that's so nice of you to say that. ......You sick?Well, whatever. I'm gonna be in my reserved seat in the hall...... waiting...... upp! ......Urk!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Thanks everyone.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: We didn't come back for your spikey headed ass!We came back for Marlene. Guess it's jes' my...... whatcha call, feelings or somethin'.I, uh I ain't got now words now......

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: ......Although she's not here, she left us a window of opportunity...

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: We can't let it go like this.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: ......Aeris.She was smiling to the end.We have to do something, or that smile will just freeze like that.Let's all go together.Memories of Aeris......Although she should've returned to the planet by now, something stopped her and now she's stuck......We've got to let go of Aeris's memory.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Has anyone here changed their mind?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: I'm counting on you, Cid.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Yeah, yeah......There are 2 levers here that've been buggin' me for a while now...Let me try them out.All right, so what should I do?You decide, Cloud.

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: This is our last battle.Our target is the North Cave. Our enemy is...... Sephiroth!So let's move out!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: We're almost to the North Cave! We're on our way, Sephiroth!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Man, I'm going to stick it to him!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: What is it, Cid?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Errrrggh! Some incredible force! Losing... control......!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Get the hell outta here, flunkies! Didn't I tell you all to go home!?

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Yes, sir. This is our home!!

Chapter: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For
Line: Oh ma--......stop trying to act so cool.All right, you jokers! Hold me down with everything you got!!Geronimo!!
Where is the Promised Land...? Maybe Bugenhagen knows.Isn't Nanaki starting to notice? The reason why Bugenhagen sent him away from the canyon...
He's finally come home, but Mr. Bugenhagen doesn't seem well...I want to hear Mr. Bugenhagen's talk with Nanaki like we used to do...
I think Bugenhagen has foreseen it.About the planet... About Nanaki... And, about himself...But, Bugenhagen would never say that. All he says is 'Ho Ho Hoooo'...
What's wrong with Bugenhagen? Is he sick?
No need to be sad, even if something should happen. Everything will return to the planet... Bugenhagen says so.Just the thought of something happening to Bugenhagen... worries me.
Ho Ho...... Hoooo. You......?It's been a while... since I've been out. I think I must have... tired myself out a bit.Ahh...... don't tell Nanaki. He'll only worry...
Grandfather!!
Grandfather!!
...Nanaki...? ...you're still...... here?
I can't leave you like this, grandfather...!It's the duty of my... Seto's son, to guard this canyon and her people...

...listen, Nanaki. I think you may already know.If you have any mission in life, it is not to defend this valley.Look at the withering mountain grass. Listen to the warble of the new born chocobo's.Look always to the eternal flow of time which is far greater than the span of a human life.It will teach you more, than staying here in the valley...What you will see will eventually become a part of life's dream.For my children...... And for your children......So please, Nanaki... Go with Cloud... And with your eyes... your ears...
Ho Ho...... Hoooo. Now, now. Don't look like that. I'm all right.It's a wide world and you must go out and see it... You may even find your life's mate. You never know.
Grandfather......
Oh yes... take this along. I think it will look good on you now.Ho Ho......
Nanaki... Is Bugenhagen...?
......Grandpa told me that he's going away again!
Away...?
It seems like he really liked that Airship.He told me he couldn't stay still and just zipped out of here!He even gave me a gift, look!
Wait a minute. Aren't you supposed to give gifts AFTER you come back?Ha ha...... Grandpa sure is strange! Haa... ha ha...... ha......
Hmm... So maybe we'll run into him again somewhere.
Yeah... maybe...Thanks, Cloud......
Nanaki, is it true that Mr. Bugenhagen left on a journey? Then that means he's better, right? He IS going to come back soon, right?
.........Don't worry. Grandpa will come back floating, saying 'Ho Ho Hoooo' again...
Yea, that's right! 'Ho Ho Hoooo'!It's Ho Ho Hoooo! Ho Ho Hoooo!
Bugenhagen is what keeps our hearts strong...
I've heard this melody somewhere before. Managed to play well...
I have the sheet music for that song.Huh? Wait a minute! There's something inside the music sheet.
Hey! This is your food.
Oh, here!!Put on this.It smells a little though don't complain.You look pretty good with that.Well......
Yo! Old guy! We at Midgar yet?
Shaddap! You're lucky I even gave you a ride!
What're you gonna do once we get to Midgar?
I know what I'm gonna do.I got a place I can crash for a while...No wait, the mother lives there, too...

Yep... gotta change my plans!Hmm......No matter what I do, I need some money first......Hey, wanna start a business? But what could we do?Hey, Cloud.Think there's anything I'd be good at?Hey old guy!What do you think I'd be good at?
What're you yappin' about? You're still young ain't ya?Young folks should try everything!You gotta pay your dues while you're young.Go out and look for what you really want.
Try everything... That's easy for him to say...
Hey... didn't you even hear a word I said?
Listen, I'm gonna become a mercenary and that's that.Boring stuff, dangerous stuff, anything for money.I'm gonna be rich!So, Cloud? What are YOU gonna do?
No, wait... you got it all wrong.
Just kidding... I won't leave you hanging like that.
What do you want to do with him?
...Ah... ughhhh......
...Forget it. Just leave him.

Hey, listen to me! I heard the barrier protecting Sephiroth is gone!But with Rufus dead, the Shinra troops don't know what to do. Heidegger and Scarlet don't have what it takes to lead the troops......I really thought something was finally going to get done, but everything's the same... not a damn thing's changed!
Ah, youth... You really believe that big meteor filling up the sky's going to fall here?If Shinra, Inc was our last hope, and they've been beaten by terrorists...... Are we all going to die?
Dear, can you believe it!? They say that Shinra's gone under!!This world is coming to an end all because those terrorists called AVALANCHE stuck their noses in the wrong place!
If something ever happened to President Rufus, That'd be the end of Shinra, Inc...... and the rest of the world, too.
The North Crater barrier's been demolished?So now's the time to defeat Sephiroth.
They say the remaining members of AVALANCHE broke Shinra's resistance and destroyed the Mako cannon at Midgar.What's going to happen to the world...?
I heard the remaining members of AVALANCHE smashed the Shinra troops at Midgar.Lately, there's been a number of scary incidents. I hate it. Just hate it!
OH! It's "Guidebook"! Wanna trade it for this Underwater Materia?How about it?
- Trade- Don't trade
Ok then, it's a done deal!
OH! It's "Desert Rose"! Wanna trade it for that Chocobo over there?How about it?
- Trade
Ok then, it's a done deal!
OH! It's the Earth Harp! Wanna trade it for some Master Materia?I'm not bein' stingy either! I'll give you all three of 'em!How about it?
- Trade
Ok then, it's a done deal!It's a 3-piece Master Materia set... and it's all yours!
"[item]" and "[item]"... Will you guys look for them for me?Now if I can just get "[item]", I can start my journey...
I guess it's time to go on a journey for the souls of my departed friends......

Character: Soldier on the Path to the Airport
Line: I finally got orders to join the Great Sephiroth Plan. I even get to go on the Gelnika too...But, I'm just gonna ignore them. I wanna live to see the end of the world.If I'm lucky... There'll be a good place for me in the New World.
Once the barrier's gone, I can hear cries from beyond the mountain...
A sad voice is getting louder every second!The mountain must be crying. Is it hurt?
A bright light hsattered the barrier at the crater! What in the world's goin' on!?

Chapter: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Chapter: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything
Line: Yeah? Really? Well, that's fine.They've been doin' that play every summer since I was a kid.An' I remember seein' it just once...That was when I was in Midgar interviewing to be a pilot.I had some free time and thought I'd catch the play.Now, I'm no big fan of the theater or anything.But this thing put me to sleep, just like I thought it would.Finally during the last scene, the guy next to me woke me up tellin' me my snorin' was too loud.So about all I really remember of that play is the end...The sister of the lead asks her lover,Do you really have to leave?And the guy says,I promised. The people I love, are waiting.......I don't understand. Not at all. But...... please take care of yourself.Of course... I'll come back to you. Even if you don't promise to wait. I'll return knowing that you'll be here.I remember thinking when I heard those lines,*&%! What the hell's he talkin' about? But, you know... now I'm not so sure...I think I understand......
